92 static inline double normClamp( double value, double def )
93 {
94  return ( value < 0.0 || value > 1.0 ) ? def : value;
95 }

232 FormWidgetsController* PageViewPrivate::formWidgetsController()
233 {
234  if ( !formsWidgetController )
235  {
236  formsWidgetController = new FormWidgetsController( document );
237  QObject::connect( formsWidgetController, SIGNAL( changed( int ) ),
238  q, SLOT( slotFormChanged( int ) ) );
239  QObject::connect( formsWidgetController, SIGNAL( action( Okular::Action* ) ),
240  q, SLOT( slotAction( Okular::Action* ) ) );
241  }
242 
243  return formsWidgetController;
244 }
245 
246 OkularTTS* PageViewPrivate::tts()
247 {
248  if ( !m_tts )
249  {
250  m_tts = new OkularTTS( q );
251  if ( aSpeakStop )
252  {
253  QObject::connect( m_tts, SIGNAL(hasSpeechs(bool)),
254  aSpeakStop, SLOT(setEnabled(bool)) );
255  QObject::connect( m_tts, SIGNAL(errorMessage(QString)),
256  q, SLOT(errorMessage(QString)) );
257  }
258  }
259 
260  return m_tts;
261 }

264 /* PageView. What's in this file? -> quick overview.
265  * Code weight (in rows) and meaning:
266  * 160 - constructor and creating actions plus their connected slots (empty stuff)
267  * 70 - DocumentObserver inherited methodes (important)
268  * 550 - events: mouse, keyboard, drag/drop
269  * 170 - slotRelayoutPages: set contents of the scrollview on continuous/single modes
270  * 100 - zoom: zooming pages in different ways, keeping update the toolbar actions, etc..
271  * other misc functions: only slotRequestVisiblePixmaps and pickItemOnPoint noticeable,
272  * and many insignificant stuff like this comment :-)
273  */
274 PageView::PageView( QWidget *parent, Okular::Document *document )
275  : QAbstractScrollArea( parent )
276  , Okular::View( QString::fromLatin1( "PageView" ) )
277 {
278  // create and initialize private storage structure
279  d = new PageViewPrivate( this );
280  d->document = document;
281  d->aRotateClockwise = 0;
282  d->aRotateCounterClockwise = 0;
283  d->aRotateOriginal = 0;
284  d->aViewMode = 0;
285  d->zoomMode = PageView::ZoomFitWidth;
286  d->zoomFactor = 1.0;
287  d->mouseSelecting = false;
288  d->mouseTextSelecting = false;
289  d->mouseOnRect = false;
290  d->mouseAnn = 0;
291  d->tableDividersGuessed = false;
292  d->viewportMoveActive = false;
293  d->lastSourceLocationViewportPageNumber = -1;
294  d->lastSourceLocationViewportNormalizedX = 0.0;
295  d->lastSourceLocationViewportNormalizedY = 0.0;
296  d->viewportMoveTimer = 0;
297  d->scrollIncrement = 0;
298  d->autoScrollTimer = 0;
299  d->annotator = 0;
300  d->dirtyLayout = false;
301  d->blockViewport = false;
302  d->blockPixmapsRequest = false;
303  d->messageWindow = new PageViewMessage(this);
304  d->m_formsVisible = false;
305  d->formsWidgetController = 0;
306  d->m_tts = 0;
307  d->refreshTimer = 0;
308  d->refreshPage = -1;
309  d->aRotateClockwise = 0;
310  d->aRotateCounterClockwise = 0;
311  d->aRotateOriginal = 0;
312  d->aPageSizes = 0;
313  d->aTrimMargins = 0;
314  d->aMouseNormal = 0;
315  //added by Ganesh P Kumar on 29/3/2014 2156 hrs IST
316  d->aRightToLeft = 0;
317  //modification ends
318  d->aMouseSelect = 0;
319  d->aMouseTextSelect = 0;
320  d->aToggleAnnotator = 0;
321  d->aZoomFitWidth = 0;
322  d->aZoomFitPage = 0;
323  d->aZoomAutoFit = 0;
324  d->aViewMode = 0;
325  d->aViewContinuous = 0;
326  d->aPrevAction = 0;
327  d->aToggleForms = 0;
328  d->aSpeakDoc = 0;
329  d->aSpeakPage = 0;
330  d->aSpeakStop = 0;
331  d->actionCollection = 0;
332  d->aPageSizes=0;
333  d->setting_viewCols = Okular::Settings::viewColumns();
334  d->mouseModeActionGroup = 0;
335  d->penDown = false;
336  d->aMouseMagnifier = 0;
337 
338  switch( Okular::Settings::zoomMode() )
339  {
340  case 0:
341  {
342  d->zoomFactor = 1;
343  d->zoomMode = PageView::ZoomFixed;
344  break;
345  }
346  case 1:
347  {
348  d->zoomMode = PageView::ZoomFitWidth;
349  break;
350  }
351  case 2:
352  {
353  d->zoomMode = PageView::ZoomFitPage;
354  break;
355  }
356  case 3:
357  {
358  d->zoomMode = PageView::ZoomFitAuto;
359  break;
360  }
361  }
362 
363  d->delayResizeEventTimer = new QTimer( this );
364  d->delayResizeEventTimer->setSingleShot( true );
365  connect( d->delayResizeEventTimer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(delayedResizeEvent()) );
366 
367  setFrameStyle(QFrame::NoFrame);
368 
369  setAttribute( Qt::WA_StaticContents );
370 
371  setObjectName( QLatin1String( "okular::pageView" ) );
372 
373  // viewport setup: setup focus, accept drops and track mouse
374  viewport()->setFocusProxy( this );
375  viewport()->setFocusPolicy( Qt::StrongFocus );
376  viewport()->setAttribute( Qt::WA_OpaquePaintEvent );
377  viewport()->setAttribute( Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground );
378  setAcceptDrops( true );
379  viewport()->setMouseTracking( true );
380  viewport()->setAutoFillBackground( false );
381  // the apparently "magic" value of 20 is the same used internally in QScrollArea
382  verticalScrollBar()->setSingleStep( 20 );
383  horizontalScrollBar()->setSingleStep( 20 );
384 
385  // conntect the padding of the viewport to pixmaps requests
386  connect(horizontalScrollBar(), SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), this, SLOT(slotRequestVisiblePixmaps(int)));
387  connect(verticalScrollBar(), SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), this, SLOT(slotRequestVisiblePixmaps(int)));
388  connect( &d->dragScrollTimer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(slotDragScroll()) );
389 
390  d->leftClickTimer.setSingleShot( true );
391  connect( &d->leftClickTimer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(slotShowSizeAllCursor()) );
392 
393  // set a corner button to resize the view to the page size
394 // QPushButton * resizeButton = new QPushButton( viewport() );
395 // resizeButton->setPixmap( SmallIcon("crop") );
396 // setCornerWidget( resizeButton );
397 // resizeButton->setEnabled( false );
398  // connect(...);
399  setAttribute( Qt::WA_InputMethodEnabled, true );
400 
401  d->magnifierView = new MagnifierView(document, this);
402  d->magnifierView->hide();
403  d->magnifierView->setGeometry(0, 0, 351, 201); // TODO: more dynamic?
404  document->addObserver(d->magnifierView);
405 
406  connect(document, SIGNAL(processMovieAction(const Okular::MovieAction*)), this, SLOT(slotProcessMovieAction(const Okular::MovieAction*)));
407  connect(document, SIGNAL(processRenditionAction(const Okular::RenditionAction*)), this, SLOT(slotProcessRenditionAction(const Okular::RenditionAction*)));
408 
409  // schedule the welcome message
410  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(this, "slotShowWelcome", Qt::QueuedConnection);
411 }
412 
413 PageView::~PageView()
414 {
415  if ( d->m_tts )
416  d->m_tts->stopAllSpeechs();
417 
418  // delete the local storage structure
419 
420  // We need to assign it to a different list otherwise slotAnnotationWindowDestroyed
421  // will bite us and clear d->m_annowindows
422  QHash< Okular::Annotation *, AnnotWindow * > annowindows = d->m_annowindows;
423  d->m_annowindows.clear();
424  qDeleteAll( annowindows );
425 
426  // delete all widgets
427  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator dIt = d->items.constBegin(), dEnd = d->items.constEnd();
428  for ( ; dIt != dEnd; ++dIt )
429  delete *dIt;
430  delete d->formsWidgetController;
431  d->document->removeObserver( this );
432  delete d;
433 }

435 void PageView::setupBaseActions( KActionCollection * ac )
436 {
437  d->actionCollection = ac;
438 
439  // Zoom actions ( higher scales takes lots of memory! )
440  d->aZoom = new KSelectAction(KIcon( "page-zoom" ), i18n("Zoom"), this);
441  ac->addAction("zoom_to", d->aZoom );
442  d->aZoom->setEditable( true );
443  d->aZoom->setMaxComboViewCount( 14 );
444  connect( d->aZoom, SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)), this, SLOT(slotZoom()) );
445  updateZoomText();
446 
447  d->aZoomIn = KStandardAction::zoomIn( this, SLOT(slotZoomIn()), ac );
448 
449  d->aZoomOut = KStandardAction::zoomOut( this, SLOT(slotZoomOut()), ac );
450 }

485  d->aTrimMargins->setChecked( Okular::Settings::trimMargins() );

487  /* Added by Ganesh P Kumar on 29/3/2014 2158 hrs IST */
488  /* Incomplete: Need to figure out actions */

495  /* Modification ends */
496

505  d->aZoomAutoFit = new KToggleAction(KIcon( "zoom-fit-best" ), i18n("&Auto Fit"), this);
506  ac->addAction("view_auto_fit", d->aZoomAutoFit );
507  connect( d->aZoomAutoFit, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), SLOT(slotAutoFitToggled(bool)) );
508  // View-Layout actions
509  d->aViewMode = new KActionMenu( KIcon( "view-split-left-right" ), i18n( "&View Mode" ), this );
510  d->aViewMode->setDelayed( false );
511 #define ADD_VIEWMODE_ACTION( text, name, id ) \
512 do { \
513  KAction *vm = new KAction( text, d->aViewMode->menu() ); \
514  vm->setCheckable( true ); \
515  vm->setData( qVariantFromValue( id ) ); \
516  d->aViewMode->addAction( vm ); \
517  ac->addAction( name, vm ); \
518  vmGroup->addAction( vm ); \
519 } while( 0 )
520  ac->addAction("view_render_mode", d->aViewMode );
521  QActionGroup *vmGroup = new QActionGroup( d->aViewMode->menu() );
522  ADD_VIEWMODE_ACTION( i18n( "Single Page" ), "view_render_mode_single", (int)Okular::Settings::EnumViewMode::Single );
523  ADD_VIEWMODE_ACTION( i18n( "Facing Pages" ), "view_render_mode_facing", (int)Okular::Settings::EnumViewMode::Facing );
524  ADD_VIEWMODE_ACTION( i18n( "Facing Pages (Center First Page)" ), "view_render_mode_facing_center_first", (int)Okular::Settings::EnumViewMode::FacingFirstCentered );
525  ADD_VIEWMODE_ACTION( i18n( "Overview" ), "view_render_mode_overview", (int)Okular::Settings::EnumViewMode::Summary );
526  const QList<QAction *> viewModeActions = d->aViewMode->menu()->actions();
527  foreach(QAction *viewModeAction, viewModeActions)
528  {
529  if (viewModeAction->data().toInt() == Okular::Settings::viewMode())
530  {
531  viewModeAction->setChecked( true );
532  }
533  }
534  connect( vmGroup, SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)), this, SLOT(slotViewMode(QAction*)) );
535 #undef ADD_VIEWMODE_ACTION
536 
537  d->aViewContinuous = new KToggleAction(KIcon( "view-list-text" ), i18n("&Continuous"), this);
538  ac->addAction("view_continuous", d->aViewContinuous );
539  connect( d->aViewContinuous, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), SLOT(slotContinuousToggled(bool)) );
540  d->aViewContinuous->setChecked( Okular::Settings::viewContinuous() );
541 
542  // Mouse mode actions for viewer mode
543  d->mouseModeActionGroup = new QActionGroup( this );
544  d->mouseModeActionGroup->setExclusive( true );
545  d->aMouseNormal = new KAction( KIcon( "input-mouse" ), i18n( "&Browse Tool" ), this );
546  ac->addAction("mouse_drag", d->aMouseNormal );
547  connect( d->aMouseNormal, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotSetMouseNormal()) );
548  d->aMouseNormal->setIconText( i18nc( "Browse Tool", "Browse" ) );
549  d->aMouseNormal->setCheckable( true );
550  d->aMouseNormal->setShortcut( Qt::CTRL + Qt::Key_1 );
551  d->aMouseNormal->setActionGroup( d->mouseModeActionGroup );
552  d->aMouseNormal->setChecked( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Browse );
553 
554  KAction * mz = new KAction(KIcon( "page-zoom" ), i18n("&Zoom Tool"), this);
555  ac->addAction("mouse_zoom", mz );
556  connect( mz, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotSetMouseZoom()) );
557  mz->setIconText( i18nc( "Zoom Tool", "Zoom" ) );
558  mz->setCheckable( true );
559  mz->setShortcut( Qt::CTRL + Qt::Key_2 );
560  mz->setActionGroup( d->mouseModeActionGroup );
561  mz->setChecked( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Zoom );
562 
563  KAction * aToggleChangeColors = new KAction(i18n("&Toggle Change Colors"), this);
564  ac->addAction("toggle_change_colors", aToggleChangeColors );
565  connect( aToggleChangeColors, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotToggleChangeColors()) );
566 }

568 // WARNING: 'setupViewerActions' must have been called before this method

686 void PageView::fitPageWidth( int page )
687 {
688  // zoom: Fit Width, columns: 1. setActions + relayout + setPage + update
689  d->zoomMode = ZoomFitWidth;
690  Okular::Settings::setViewMode( 0 );
691  d->aZoomFitWidth->setChecked( true );
692  d->aZoomFitPage->setChecked( false );
693  d->aZoomAutoFit->setChecked( false );
694  d->aViewMode->menu()->actions().at( 0 )->setChecked( true );
695  viewport()->setUpdatesEnabled( false );
696  slotRelayoutPages();
697  viewport()->setUpdatesEnabled( true );
698  d->document->setViewportPage( page );
699  updateZoomText();
700  setFocus();
701 }

703 void PageView::openAnnotationWindow( Okular::Annotation * annotation, int pageNumber )
704 {
705  if ( !annotation )
706  return;
707 
708  // find the annot window
709  AnnotWindow* existWindow = 0;
710  QHash< Okular::Annotation *, AnnotWindow * >::ConstIterator it = d->m_annowindows.constFind( annotation );
711  if ( it != d->m_annowindows.constEnd() )
712  {
713  existWindow = *it;
714  }
715 
716  if ( existWindow == 0 )
717  {
718  existWindow = new AnnotWindow( this, annotation, d->document, pageNumber );
719  connect(existWindow, SIGNAL(destroyed(QObject*)), this, SLOT(slotAnnotationWindowDestroyed(QObject*)));
720 
721  d->m_annowindows.insert( annotation, existWindow );
722  }
723 
724  existWindow->show();
725 }
726 
727 void PageView::slotAnnotationWindowDestroyed( QObject * window )
728 {
729  QHash< Okular::Annotation*, AnnotWindow * >::Iterator it = d->m_annowindows.begin();
730  QHash< Okular::Annotation*, AnnotWindow * >::Iterator itEnd = d->m_annowindows.end();
731  while ( it != itEnd )
732  {
733  if ( it.value() == window )
734  {
735  it = d->m_annowindows.erase( it );
736  }
737  else
738  {
739  ++it;
740  }
741  }
742 }

744 void PageView::displayMessage( const QString & message, const QString & details, PageViewMessage::Icon icon, int duration )
745 {
746  if ( !Okular::Settings::showOSD() )
747  {
748  if (icon == PageViewMessage::Error)
749  {
750  if ( !details.isEmpty() )
751  KMessageBox::detailedError( this, message, details );
752  else
753  KMessageBox::error( this, message );
754  }
755  return;
756  }
757 
758  // hide messageWindow if string is empty
759  if ( message.isEmpty() )
760  return d->messageWindow->hide();
761 
762  // display message (duration is length dependant)
763  if (duration==-1)
764  {
765  duration = 500 + 100 * message.length();
766  if ( !details.isEmpty() )
767  duration += 500 + 100 * details.length();
768  }
769  d->messageWindow->display( message, details, icon, duration );
770 }
771 
772 void PageView::reparseConfig()
773 {
774  // set the scroll bars policies
775  Qt::ScrollBarPolicy scrollBarMode = Okular::Settings::showScrollBars() ?
776  Qt::ScrollBarAsNeeded : Qt::ScrollBarAlwaysOff;
777  if ( horizontalScrollBarPolicy() != scrollBarMode )
778  {
779  setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy( scrollBarMode );
780  setVerticalScrollBarPolicy( scrollBarMode );
781  }
782 
783  if ( Okular::Settings::viewMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumViewMode::Summary &&
784  ( (int)Okular::Settings::viewColumns() != d->setting_viewCols ) )
785  {
786  d->setting_viewCols = Okular::Settings::viewColumns();
787 
788  slotRelayoutPages();
789  }
790 
791  updatePageStep();
792 
793  if ( d->annotator )
794  {
795  d->annotator->setEnabled( false );
796  d->annotator->reparseConfig();
797  if ( d->aToggleAnnotator->isChecked() )
798  slotToggleAnnotator( true );
799  }
800 
801  // Something like invert colors may have changed
802  // As we don't have a way to find out the old value
803  // We just update the viewport, this shouldn't be that bad
804  // since it's just a repaint of pixmaps we already have
805  viewport()->update();
806 }

843 QString PageViewPrivate::selectedText() const
844 {
845  if ( pagesWithTextSelection.isEmpty() )
846  return QString();
847 
848  QString text;
849  QList< int > selpages = pagesWithTextSelection.toList();
850  qSort( selpages );
851  const Okular::Page * pg = 0;
852  if ( selpages.count() == 1 )
853  {
854  pg = document->page( selpages.first() );
855  text.append( pg->text( pg->textSelection(), Okular::TextPage::CentralPixelTextAreaInclusionBehaviour ) );
856  }
857  else
858  {
859  pg = document->page( selpages.first() );
860  text.append( pg->text( pg->textSelection(), Okular::TextPage::CentralPixelTextAreaInclusionBehaviour ) );
861  int end = selpages.count() - 1;
862  for( int i = 1; i < end; ++i )
863  {
864  pg = document->page( selpages.at( i ) );
865  text.append( pg->text( 0, Okular::TextPage::CentralPixelTextAreaInclusionBehaviour ) );
866  }
867  pg = document->page( selpages.last() );
868  text.append( pg->text( pg->textSelection(), Okular::TextPage::CentralPixelTextAreaInclusionBehaviour ) );
869  }
870  return text;
871 }
872 
873 void PageView::copyTextSelection() const
874 {
875  const QString text = d->selectedText();
876  if ( !text.isEmpty() )
877  {
878  QClipboard *cb = QApplication::clipboard();
879  cb->setText( text, QClipboard::Clipboard );
880  }
881 }

883 void PageView::selectAll()
884 {
885  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator it = d->items.constBegin(), itEnd = d->items.constEnd();
886  for ( ; it < itEnd; ++it )
887  {
888  Okular::RegularAreaRect * area = textSelectionForItem( *it );
889  d->pagesWithTextSelection.insert( (*it)->pageNumber() );
890  d->document->setPageTextSelection( (*it)->pageNumber(), area, palette().color( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight ) );
891  }
892 }
893 
894 //BEGIN DocumentObserver inherited methods
895 void PageView::notifySetup( const QVector< Okular::Page * > & pageSet, int setupFlags )
896 {
897  bool documentChanged = setupFlags & Okular::DocumentObserver::DocumentChanged;
898  // reuse current pages if nothing new
899  if ( ( pageSet.count() == d->items.count() ) && !documentChanged && !( setupFlags & Okular::DocumentObserver::NewLayoutForPages ) )
900  {
901  int count = pageSet.count();
902  for ( int i = 0; (i < count) && !documentChanged; i++ )
903  if ( (int)pageSet[i]->number() != d->items[i]->pageNumber() )
904  documentChanged = true;
905  if ( !documentChanged )
906  return;
907  }
908 
909  // delete all widgets (one for each page in pageSet)
910  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator dIt = d->items.constBegin(), dEnd = d->items.constEnd();
911  for ( ; dIt != dEnd; ++dIt )
912  delete *dIt;
913  d->items.clear();
914  d->visibleItems.clear();
915  d->pagesWithTextSelection.clear();
916  toggleFormWidgets( false );
917  if ( d->formsWidgetController )
918  d->formsWidgetController->dropRadioButtons();
919 
920  bool haspages = !pageSet.isEmpty();
921  bool hasformwidgets = false;
922  // create children widgets
923  QVector< Okular::Page * >::const_iterator setIt = pageSet.constBegin(), setEnd = pageSet.constEnd();
924  for ( ; setIt != setEnd; ++setIt )
925  {
926  PageViewItem * item = new PageViewItem( *setIt );
927  d->items.push_back( item );
928 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
929  kDebug().nospace() << "cropped geom for " << d->items.last()->pageNumber() << " is " << d->items.last()->croppedGeometry();
930 #endif
931  const QLinkedList< Okular::FormField * > pageFields = (*setIt)->formFields();
932  QLinkedList< Okular::FormField * >::const_iterator ffIt = pageFields.constBegin(), ffEnd = pageFields.constEnd();
933  for ( ; ffIt != ffEnd; ++ffIt )
934  {
935  Okular::FormField * ff = *ffIt;
936  FormWidgetIface * w = FormWidgetFactory::createWidget( ff, viewport() );
937  if ( w )
938  {
939  w->setPageItem( item );
940  w->setFormWidgetsController( d->formWidgetsController() );
941  w->setVisibility( false );
942  w->setCanBeFilled( d->document->isAllowed( Okular::AllowFillForms ) );
943  item->formWidgets().insert( ff->id(), w );
944  hasformwidgets = true;
945  }
946  }
947  const QLinkedList< Okular::Annotation * > annotations = (*setIt)->annotations();
948  QLinkedList< Okular::Annotation * >::const_iterator aIt = annotations.constBegin(), aEnd = annotations.constEnd();
949  for ( ; aIt != aEnd; ++aIt )
950  {
951  Okular::Annotation * a = *aIt;
952  if ( a->subType() == Okular::Annotation::AMovie )
953  {
954  Okular::MovieAnnotation * movieAnn = static_cast< Okular::MovieAnnotation * >( a );
955  VideoWidget * vw = new VideoWidget( movieAnn, movieAnn->movie(), d->document, viewport() );
956  item->videoWidgets().insert( movieAnn->movie(), vw );
957  vw->pageInitialized();
958  }
959  else if ( a->subType() == Okular::Annotation::AScreen )
960  {
961  const Okular::ScreenAnnotation * screenAnn = static_cast< Okular::ScreenAnnotation * >( a );
962  Okular::Movie *movie = GuiUtils::renditionMovieFromScreenAnnotation( screenAnn );
963  if ( movie )
964  {
965  VideoWidget * vw = new VideoWidget( screenAnn, movie, d->document, viewport() );
966  item->videoWidgets().insert( movie, vw );
967  vw->pageInitialized();
968  }
969  }
970  }
971  }
972 
973  // invalidate layout so relayout/repaint will happen on next viewport change
974  if ( haspages )
975  {
976  // We do a delayed call to slotRelayoutPages but also set the dirtyLayout
977  // because we might end up in notifyViewportChanged while slotRelayoutPages
978  // has not been done and we don't want that to happen
979  d->dirtyLayout = true;
980  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(this, "slotRelayoutPages", Qt::QueuedConnection);
981  }
982  else
983  {
984  // update the mouse cursor when closing because we may have close through a link and
985  // want the cursor to come back to the normal cursor
986  updateCursor();
987  // then, make the message window and scrollbars disappear, and trigger a repaint
988  d->messageWindow->hide();
989  resizeContentArea( QSize( 0,0 ) );
990  viewport()->update(); // when there is no change to the scrollbars, no repaint would
991  // be done and the old document would still be shown
992  }
993 
994  // OSD to display pages
995  if ( documentChanged && pageSet.count() > 0 && Okular::Settings::showOSD() )
996  d->messageWindow->display(
997  i18np(" Loaded a one-page document.",
998  " Loaded a %1-page document.",
999  pageSet.count() ),
1000  QString(),
1001  PageViewMessage::Info, 4000 );
1002 
1003  updateActionState( haspages, documentChanged, hasformwidgets );
1004 
1005  // We need to assign it to a different list otherwise slotAnnotationWindowDestroyed
1006  // will bite us and clear d->m_annowindows
1007  QHash< Okular::Annotation *, AnnotWindow * > annowindows = d->m_annowindows;
1008  d->m_annowindows.clear();
1009  qDeleteAll( annowindows );
1010 
1011  selectionClear();
1012 }
1013 
1014 void PageView::updateActionState( bool haspages, bool documentChanged, bool hasformwidgets )
1015 {
1016  if ( d->aPageSizes )
1017  { // may be null if dummy mode is on
1018  bool pageSizes = d->document->supportsPageSizes();
1019  d->aPageSizes->setEnabled( pageSizes );
1020  // set the new page sizes:
1021  // - if the generator supports them
1022  // - if the document changed
1023  if ( pageSizes && documentChanged )
1024  {
1025  QStringList items;
1026  foreach ( const Okular::PageSize &p, d->document->pageSizes() )
1027  items.append( p.name() );
1028  d->aPageSizes->setItems( items );
1029  }
1030  }
1031 
1032  if ( d->aTrimMargins )
1033  d->aTrimMargins->setEnabled( haspages );
1034 
1035  if ( d->aRightToLeft )
1036  d->aRightToLeft->setEnabled( haspages );
1037 
1038  if ( d->aViewMode )
1039  d->aViewMode->setEnabled( haspages );
1040 
1041  if ( d->aViewContinuous )
1042  d->aViewContinuous->setEnabled( haspages );
1043 
1044  if ( d->aZoomFitWidth )
1045  d->aZoomFitWidth->setEnabled( haspages );
1046  if ( d->aZoomFitPage )
1047  d->aZoomFitPage->setEnabled( haspages );
1048  if ( d->aZoomAutoFit )
1049  d->aZoomAutoFit->setEnabled( haspages );
1050 
1051  if ( d->aZoom )
1052  {
1053  d->aZoom->selectableActionGroup()->setEnabled( haspages );
1054  d->aZoom->setEnabled( haspages );
1055  }
1056  if ( d->aZoomIn )
1057  d->aZoomIn->setEnabled( haspages );
1058  if ( d->aZoomOut )
1059  d->aZoomOut->setEnabled( haspages );
1060 
1061  if ( d->mouseModeActionGroup )
1062  d->mouseModeActionGroup->setEnabled( haspages );
1063 
1064  if ( d->aRotateClockwise )
1065  d->aRotateClockwise->setEnabled( haspages );
1066  if ( d->aRotateCounterClockwise )
1067  d->aRotateCounterClockwise->setEnabled( haspages );
1068  if ( d->aRotateOriginal )
1069  d->aRotateOriginal->setEnabled( haspages );
1070  if ( d->aToggleForms )
1071  { // may be null if dummy mode is on
1072  d->aToggleForms->setEnabled( haspages && hasformwidgets );
1073  }
1074  bool allowAnnotations = d->document->isAllowed( Okular::AllowNotes );
1075  if ( d->annotator )
1076  {
1077  bool allowTools = haspages && allowAnnotations;
1078  d->annotator->setToolsEnabled( allowTools );
1079  d->annotator->setTextToolsEnabled( allowTools && d->document->supportsSearching() );
1080  }
1081  if ( d->aToggleAnnotator )
1082  {
1083  if ( !allowAnnotations && d->aToggleAnnotator->isChecked() )
1084  {
1085  d->aToggleAnnotator->trigger();
1086  }
1087  d->aToggleAnnotator->setEnabled( allowAnnotations );
1088  }
1089  if ( d->aSpeakDoc )
1090  {
1091  const bool enablettsactions = haspages ? Okular::Settings::useKTTSD() : false;
1092  d->aSpeakDoc->setEnabled( enablettsactions );
1093  d->aSpeakPage->setEnabled( enablettsactions );
1094  }
1095  if (d->aMouseMagnifier)
1096  d->aMouseMagnifier->setEnabled(d->document->supportsTiles());
1097 }

1114 void PageView::setLastSourceLocationViewport( const Okular::DocumentViewport& vp )
1115 {

1117  {
1118  d->lastSourceLocationViewportNormalizedX = normClamp( vp.rePos.normalizedX, 0.5 );
1119  d->lastSourceLocationViewportNormalizedY = normClamp( vp.rePos.normalizedY, 0.0 );
1120  }
1121  else
1122  {
1123  d->lastSourceLocationViewportNormalizedX = 0.5;
1124  d->lastSourceLocationViewportNormalizedY = 0.0;
1125  }
1126  d->lastSourceLocationViewportPageNumber = vp.pageNumber;
1127  viewport()->update();
1128 }

1138 void PageView::notifyViewportChanged( bool smoothMove )

1142 
1143 void PageView::slotRealNotifyViewportChanged( bool smoothMove )
1144 {
1145  // if we are the one changing viewport, skip this nofity
1146  if ( d->blockViewport )
1147  return;
1148 
1149  // block setViewport outgoing calls
1150  d->blockViewport = true;
1151 
1152  // find PageViewItem matching the viewport description
1153  const Okular::DocumentViewport & vp = d->document->viewport();
1154  PageViewItem * item = 0;
1155  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator iIt = d->items.constBegin(), iEnd = d->items.constEnd();
1156  for ( ; iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
1157  if ( (*iIt)->pageNumber() == vp.pageNumber )
1158  {
1159  item = *iIt;
1160  break;
1161  }
1162  if ( !item )
1163  {
1164  kWarning() << "viewport for page" << vp.pageNumber << "has no matching item!";
1165  d->blockViewport = false;
1166  return;
1167  }
1168 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
1169  kDebug() << "document viewport changed";
1170 #endif
1171  // relayout in "Single Pages" mode or if a relayout is pending
1172  d->blockPixmapsRequest = true;
1173  if ( !Okular::Settings::viewContinuous() || d->dirtyLayout )
1174  slotRelayoutPages();
1175 
1176  // restore viewport center or use default {x-center,v-top} alignment
1177  const QRect & r = item->croppedGeometry();
1178  int newCenterX = r.left(),
1179  newCenterY = r.top();
1180  if ( vp.rePos.enabled )
1181  {
1182  if ( vp.rePos.pos == Okular::DocumentViewport::Center )
1183  {
1184  newCenterX += (int)( normClamp( vp.rePos.normalizedX, 0.5 ) * (double)r.width() );
1185  newCenterY += (int)( normClamp( vp.rePos.normalizedY, 0.0 ) * (double)r.height() );
1186  }
1187  else
1188  {
1189  // TopLeft
1190  newCenterX += (int)( normClamp( vp.rePos.normalizedX, 0.0 ) * (double)r.width() + viewport()->width() / 2 );
1191  newCenterY += (int)( normClamp( vp.rePos.normalizedY, 0.0 ) * (double)r.height() + viewport()->height() / 2 );
1192  }
1193  }
1194  else
1195  {
1196  newCenterX += r.width() / 2;
1197  newCenterY += viewport()->height() / 2 - 10;
1198  }
1199 
1200  // if smooth movement requested, setup parameters and start it
1201  if ( smoothMove )
1202  {
1203  d->viewportMoveActive = true;
1204  d->viewportMoveTime.start();
1205  d->viewportMoveDest.setX( newCenterX );
1206  d->viewportMoveDest.setY( newCenterY );
1207  if ( !d->viewportMoveTimer )
1208  {
1209  d->viewportMoveTimer = new QTimer( this );
1210  connect( d->viewportMoveTimer, SIGNAL(timeout()),
1211  this, SLOT(slotMoveViewport()) );
1212  }
1213  d->viewportMoveTimer->start( 25 );
1214  verticalScrollBar()->setEnabled( false );
1215  horizontalScrollBar()->setEnabled( false );
1216  }
1217  else
1218  center( newCenterX, newCenterY );
1219  d->blockPixmapsRequest = false;
1220 
1221  // request visible pixmaps in the current viewport and recompute it
1222  slotRequestVisiblePixmaps();
1223 
1224  // enable setViewport calls
1225  d->blockViewport = false;
1226 
1227  // update zoom text if in a ZoomFit/* zoom mode
1228  if ( d->zoomMode != ZoomFixed )
1229  updateZoomText();
1230 
1231  if( viewport() )
1232  {
1233  viewport()->update();
1234  }
1235 
1236  // since the page has moved below cursor, update it
1237  updateCursor();
1238 }
1239 
1240 void PageView::notifyPageChanged( int pageNumber, int changedFlags )
1241 {
1242  // only handle pixmap / highlight changes notifies
1243  if ( changedFlags & DocumentObserver::Bookmark )
1244  return;
1245 
1246  if ( changedFlags & DocumentObserver::Annotations )
1247  {
1248  const QLinkedList< Okular::Annotation * > annots = d->document->page( pageNumber )->annotations();
1249  const QLinkedList< Okular::Annotation * >::ConstIterator annItEnd = annots.end();
1250  QHash< Okular::Annotation*, AnnotWindow * >::Iterator it = d->m_annowindows.begin();
1251  for ( ; it != d->m_annowindows.end(); )
1252  {
1253  QLinkedList< Okular::Annotation * >::ConstIterator annIt = qFind( annots, it.key() );
1254  if ( annIt != annItEnd )
1255  {
1256  (*it)->reloadInfo();
1257  ++it;
1258  }
1259  else
1260  {
1261  AnnotWindow *w = *it;
1262  it = d->m_annowindows.erase( it );
1263  // Need to delete after removing from the list
1264  // otherwise deleting will call slotAnnotationWindowDestroyed which will mess
1265  // the list and the iterators
1266  delete w;
1267  }
1268  }
1269  }
1270 
1271  if ( changedFlags & DocumentObserver::BoundingBox )
1272  {
1273 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
1274  kDebug() << "BoundingBox change on page" << pageNumber;
1275 #endif
1276  slotRelayoutPages();
1277  slotRequestVisiblePixmaps(); // TODO: slotRelayoutPages() may have done this already!
1278  // Repaint the whole widget since layout may have changed
1279  viewport()->update();
1280  return;
1281  }
1282 
1283  // iterate over visible items: if page(pageNumber) is one of them, repaint it
1284  QLinkedList< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator iIt = d->visibleItems.constBegin(), iEnd = d->visibleItems.constEnd();
1285  for ( ; iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
1286  if ( (*iIt)->pageNumber() == pageNumber && (*iIt)->isVisible() )
1287  {
1288  // update item's rectangle plus the little outline
1289  QRect expandedRect = (*iIt)->croppedGeometry();
1290  // a PageViewItem is placed in the global page layout,
1291  // while we need to map its position in the viewport coordinates
1292  // (to get the correct area to repaint)
1293  expandedRect.translate( -contentAreaPosition() );
1294  expandedRect.adjust( -1, -1, 3, 3 );
1295  viewport()->update( expandedRect );
1296 
1297  // if we were "zoom-dragging" do not overwrite the "zoom-drag" cursor
1298  if ( cursor().shape() != Qt::SizeVerCursor )
1299  {
1300  // since the page has been regenerated below cursor, update it
1301  updateCursor();
1302  }
1303  break;
1304  }
1305 }

1307 void PageView::notifyContentsCleared( int changedFlags )
1308 {
1309  // if pixmaps were cleared, re-ask them
1310  if ( changedFlags & DocumentObserver::Pixmap )
1311  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(this, "slotRequestVisiblePixmaps", Qt::QueuedConnection);
1312 }

1314 void PageView::notifyZoom( int factor )
1315 {
1316  if ( factor > 0 )
1317  updateZoom( ZoomIn );
1318  else
1319  updateZoom( ZoomOut );
1320 }
1321 
1322 bool PageView::canUnloadPixmap( int pageNumber ) const
1323 {
1324  if ( Okular::SettingsCore::memoryLevel() == Okular::SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Low ||
1325  Okular::SettingsCore::memoryLevel() == Okular::SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Normal )
1326  {
1327  // if the item is visible, forbid unloading
1328  QLinkedList< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator vIt = d->visibleItems.constBegin(), vEnd = d->visibleItems.constEnd();
1329  for ( ; vIt != vEnd; ++vIt )
1330  if ( (*vIt)->pageNumber() == pageNumber )
1331  return false;
1332  }
1333  else
1334  {
1335  // forbid unloading of the visible items, and of the previous and next
1336  QLinkedList< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator vIt = d->visibleItems.constBegin(), vEnd = d->visibleItems.constEnd();
1337  for ( ; vIt != vEnd; ++vIt )
1338  if ( abs( (*vIt)->pageNumber() - pageNumber ) <= 1 )
1339  return false;
1340  }
1341  // if hidden premit unloading
1342  return true;
1343 }

1345 void PageView::notifyCurrentPageChanged( int previous, int current )

1350  if ( item )

1353  videoWidget->pageLeft();
1354  }
1355  }

1357  if ( current != -1 )
1358  {
1359  PageViewItem * item = d->items.at( current );
1360  if ( item )
1361  {
1362  Q_FOREACH ( VideoWidget *videoWidget, item->videoWidgets() )
1363  videoWidget->pageEntered();
1364  }
1365  }
1366 }

1405 void PageView::setCapability( ViewCapability capability, const QVariant &option )
1406 {
1407  switch ( capability )
1408  {
1409  case Zoom:
1410  {
1411  bool ok = true;
1412  double factor = option.toDouble( &ok );
1413  if ( ok && factor > 0.0 )
1414  {
1415  d->zoomFactor = static_cast< float >( factor );
1416  updateZoom( ZoomRefreshCurrent );
1417  }
1418  break;
1419  }
1420  case ZoomModality:
1421  {
1422  bool ok = true;
1423  int mode = option.toInt( &ok );
1424  if ( ok )
1425  {
1426  if ( mode >= 0 && mode < 3 )
1427  updateZoom( (ZoomMode)mode );
1428  }
1429  break;
1430  }
1431  }

1436 //BEGIN widget events
1437 void PageView::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *pe)
1438 {
1439  const QPoint areaPos = contentAreaPosition();
1440  // create the rect into contents from the clipped screen rect
1441  QRect viewportRect = viewport()->rect();
1442  viewportRect.translate( areaPos );
1443  QRect contentsRect = pe->rect().translated( areaPos ).intersect( viewportRect );
1444  if ( !contentsRect.isValid() )
1445  return;
1446 
1447 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
1448  kDebug() << "paintevent" << contentsRect;
1449 #endif
1450 
1451  // create the screen painter. a pixel painted at contentsX,contentsY
1452  // appears to the top-left corner of the scrollview.
1453  QPainter screenPainter( viewport() );
1454  // translate to simulate the scrolled content widget
1455  screenPainter.translate( -areaPos );
1456 
1457  // selectionRect is the normalized mouse selection rect
1458  QRect selectionRect = d->mouseSelectionRect;
1459  if ( !selectionRect.isNull() )
1460  selectionRect = selectionRect.normalized();
1461  // selectionRectInternal without the border
1462  QRect selectionRectInternal = selectionRect;
1463  selectionRectInternal.adjust( 1, 1, -1, -1 );
1464  // color for blending
1465  QColor selBlendColor = (selectionRect.width() > 8 || selectionRect.height() > 8) ?
1466  d->mouseSelectionColor : Qt::red;
1467 
1468  // subdivide region into rects
1469  const QVector<QRect> &allRects = pe->region().rects();
1470  uint numRects = allRects.count();
1471 
1472  // preprocess rects area to see if it worths or not using subdivision
1473  uint summedArea = 0;
1474  for ( uint i = 0; i < numRects; i++ )
1475  {
1476  const QRect & r = allRects[i];
1477  summedArea += r.width() * r.height();
1478  }
1479  // very elementary check: SUMj(Region[j].area) is less than boundingRect.area
1480  bool useSubdivision = summedArea < (0.6 * contentsRect.width() * contentsRect.height());
1481  if ( !useSubdivision )
1482  numRects = 1;
1483 
1484  // iterate over the rects (only one loop if not using subdivision)
1485  for ( uint i = 0; i < numRects; i++ )
1486  {
1487  if ( useSubdivision )
1488  {
1489  // set 'contentsRect' to a part of the sub-divided region
1490  contentsRect = allRects[i].translated( areaPos ).intersect( viewportRect );
1491  if ( !contentsRect.isValid() )
1492  continue;
1493  }
1494 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
1495  kDebug() << contentsRect;
1496 #endif
1497 
1498  // note: this check will take care of all things requiring alpha blending (not only selection)
1499  bool wantCompositing = !selectionRect.isNull() && contentsRect.intersects( selectionRect );
1500  // also alpha-blend when there is a table selection...
1501  wantCompositing |= !d->tableSelectionParts.isEmpty();
1502 
1503  if ( wantCompositing && Okular::Settings::enableCompositing() )
1504  {
1505  // create pixmap and open a painter over it (contents{left,top} becomes pixmap {0,0})
1506  QPixmap doubleBuffer( contentsRect.size() );
1507  QPainter pixmapPainter( &doubleBuffer );
1508  pixmapPainter.translate( -contentsRect.left(), -contentsRect.top() );
1509 
1510  // 1) Layer 0: paint items and clear bg on unpainted rects
1511  drawDocumentOnPainter( contentsRect, &pixmapPainter );
1512  // 2a) Layer 1a: paint (blend) transparent selection (rectangle)
1513  if ( !selectionRect.isNull() && selectionRect.intersects( contentsRect ) &&
1514  !selectionRectInternal.contains( contentsRect ) )
1515  {
1516  QRect blendRect = selectionRectInternal.intersect( contentsRect );
1517  // skip rectangles covered by the selection's border
1518  if ( blendRect.isValid() )
1519  {
1520  // grab current pixmap into a new one to colorize contents
1521  QPixmap blendedPixmap( blendRect.width(), blendRect.height() );
1522  QPainter p( &blendedPixmap );
1523  p.drawPixmap( 0, 0, doubleBuffer,
1524  blendRect.left() - contentsRect.left(), blendRect.top() - contentsRect.top(),
1525  blendRect.width(), blendRect.height() );
1526 
1527  QColor blCol = selBlendColor.dark( 140 );
1528  blCol.setAlphaF( 0.2 );
1529  p.fillRect( blendedPixmap.rect(), blCol );
1530  p.end();
1531  // copy the blended pixmap back to its place
1532  pixmapPainter.drawPixmap( blendRect.left(), blendRect.top(), blendedPixmap );
1533  }
1534  // draw border (red if the selection is too small)
1535  pixmapPainter.setPen( selBlendColor );
1536  pixmapPainter.drawRect( selectionRect.adjusted( 0, 0, -1, -1 ) );
1537  }
1538  // 2b) Layer 1b: paint (blend) transparent selection (table)
1539  foreach (const TableSelectionPart &tsp, d->tableSelectionParts) {
1540  QRect selectionPartRect = tsp.rectInItem.geometry(tsp.item->uncroppedWidth(), tsp.item->uncroppedHeight());
1541  selectionPartRect.translate( tsp.item->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft () );
1542  QRect selectionPartRectInternal = selectionPartRect;
1543  selectionPartRectInternal.adjust( 1, 1, -1, -1 );
1544  if ( !selectionPartRect.isNull() && selectionPartRect.intersects( contentsRect ) &&
1545  !selectionPartRectInternal.contains( contentsRect ) )
1546  {
1547  QRect blendRect = selectionPartRectInternal.intersect( contentsRect );
1548  // skip rectangles covered by the selection's border
1549  if ( blendRect.isValid() )
1550  {
1551  // grab current pixmap into a new one to colorize contents
1552  QPixmap blendedPixmap( blendRect.width(), blendRect.height() );
1553  QPainter p( &blendedPixmap );
1554  p.drawPixmap( 0, 0, doubleBuffer,
1555  blendRect.left() - contentsRect.left(), blendRect.top() - contentsRect.top(),
1556  blendRect.width(), blendRect.height() );
1557 
1558  QColor blCol = d->mouseSelectionColor.dark( 140 );
1559  blCol.setAlphaF( 0.2 );
1560  p.fillRect( blendedPixmap.rect(), blCol );
1561  p.end();
1562  // copy the blended pixmap back to its place
1563  pixmapPainter.drawPixmap( blendRect.left(), blendRect.top(), blendedPixmap );
1564  }
1565  // draw border (red if the selection is too small)
1566  pixmapPainter.setPen( d->mouseSelectionColor );
1567  pixmapPainter.drawRect( selectionPartRect.adjusted( 0, 0, -1, -1 ) );
1568  }
1569  }
1570  drawTableDividers( &pixmapPainter );
1571  // 3) Layer 1: give annotator painting control
1572  if ( d->annotator && d->annotator->routePaints( contentsRect ) )
1573  d->annotator->routePaint( &pixmapPainter, contentsRect );
1574  // 4) Layer 2: overlays
1575  if ( Okular::Settings::debugDrawBoundaries() )
1576  {
1577  pixmapPainter.setPen( Qt::blue );
1578  pixmapPainter.drawRect( contentsRect );
1579  }
1580 
1581  // finish painting and draw contents
1582  pixmapPainter.end();
1583  screenPainter.drawPixmap( contentsRect.left(), contentsRect.top(), doubleBuffer );
1584  }
1585  else
1586  {
1587  // 1) Layer 0: paint items and clear bg on unpainted rects
1588  drawDocumentOnPainter( contentsRect, &screenPainter );
1589  // 2a) Layer 1a: paint opaque selection (rectangle)
1590  if ( !selectionRect.isNull() && selectionRect.intersects( contentsRect ) &&
1591  !selectionRectInternal.contains( contentsRect ) )
1592  {
1593  screenPainter.setPen( palette().color( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight ).dark(110) );
1594  screenPainter.drawRect( selectionRect );
1595  }
1596  // 2b) Layer 1b: paint opaque selection (table)
1597  foreach (const TableSelectionPart &tsp, d->tableSelectionParts) {
1598  QRect selectionPartRect = tsp.rectInItem.geometry(tsp.item->uncroppedWidth(), tsp.item->uncroppedHeight());
1599  selectionPartRect.translate( tsp.item->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft () );
1600  QRect selectionPartRectInternal = selectionPartRect;
1601  selectionPartRectInternal.adjust( 1, 1, -1, -1 );
1602  if ( !selectionPartRect.isNull() && selectionPartRect.intersects( contentsRect ) &&
1603  !selectionPartRectInternal.contains( contentsRect ) )
1604  {
1605  screenPainter.setPen( palette().color( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight ).dark(110) );
1606  screenPainter.drawRect( selectionPartRect );
1607  }
1608  }
1609  drawTableDividers( &screenPainter );
1610  // 3) Layer 1: give annotator painting control
1611  if ( d->annotator && d->annotator->routePaints( contentsRect ) )
1612  d->annotator->routePaint( &screenPainter, contentsRect );
1613  // 4) Layer 2: overlays
1614  if ( Okular::Settings::debugDrawBoundaries() )
1615  {
1616  screenPainter.setPen( Qt::red );
1617  screenPainter.drawRect( contentsRect );
1618  }
1619  }
1620  }
1621 }
1622 
1623 void PageView::drawTableDividers(QPainter * screenPainter)
1624 {
1625  if (!d->tableSelectionParts.isEmpty()) {
1626  screenPainter->setPen( d->mouseSelectionColor.dark() );
1627  if (d->tableDividersGuessed) {
1628  QPen p = screenPainter->pen();
1629  p.setStyle( Qt::DashLine );
1630  screenPainter->setPen( p );
1631  }
1632  foreach (const TableSelectionPart &tsp, d->tableSelectionParts) {
1633  QRect selectionPartRect = tsp.rectInItem.geometry(tsp.item->uncroppedWidth(), tsp.item->uncroppedHeight());
1634  selectionPartRect.translate( tsp.item->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft () );
1635  QRect selectionPartRectInternal = selectionPartRect;
1636  selectionPartRectInternal.adjust( 1, 1, -1, -1 );
1637  foreach(double col, d->tableSelectionCols) {
1638  if (col >= tsp.rectInSelection.left && col <= tsp.rectInSelection.right) {
1639  col = (col - tsp.rectInSelection.left) / (tsp.rectInSelection.right - tsp.rectInSelection.left);
1640  const int x = selectionPartRect.left() + col * selectionPartRect.width() + 0.5;
1641  screenPainter->drawLine(
1642  x, selectionPartRectInternal.top(),
1643  x, selectionPartRectInternal.top() + selectionPartRectInternal.height()
1644  );
1645  }
1646  }
1647  foreach(double row, d->tableSelectionRows) {
1648  if (row >= tsp.rectInSelection.top && row <= tsp.rectInSelection.bottom) {
1649  row = (row - tsp.rectInSelection.top) / (tsp.rectInSelection.bottom - tsp.rectInSelection.top);
1650  const int y = selectionPartRect.top() + row * selectionPartRect.height() + 0.5;
1651  screenPainter->drawLine(
1652  selectionPartRectInternal.left(), y,
1653  selectionPartRectInternal.left() + selectionPartRectInternal.width(), y
1654  );
1655  }
1656  }
1657  }
1658  }
1659 }
1660 
1661 void PageView::resizeEvent( QResizeEvent *e )
1662 {
1663  if ( d->items.isEmpty() )
1664  {
1665  resizeContentArea( e->size() );
1666  return;
1667  }
1668 
1669  if ( ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFitWidth || d->zoomMode == ZoomFitAuto ) && d->verticalScrollBarVisible && !verticalScrollBar()->isVisible() && qAbs(e->oldSize().height() - e->size().height()) < verticalScrollBar()->width() )
1670  {
1671  // this saves us from infinite resizing loop because of scrollbars appearing and disappearing
1672  // see bug 160628 for more info
1673  // TODO looks are still a bit ugly because things are left uncentered
1674  // but better a bit ugly than unusable
1675  d->verticalScrollBarVisible = false;
1676  resizeContentArea( e->size() );
1677  return;
1678  }
1679  else if ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFitAuto && d->horizontalScrollBarVisible && !horizontalScrollBar()->isVisible() && qAbs(e->oldSize().width() - e->size().width()) < horizontalScrollBar()->height() )
1680  {
1681  // this saves us from infinite resizing loop because of scrollbars appearing and disappearing
1682  // TODO looks are still a bit ugly because things are left uncentered
1683  // but better a bit ugly than unusable
1684  d->horizontalScrollBarVisible = false;
1685  resizeContentArea( e->size() );
1686  return;
1687  }
1688 
1689  // start a timer that will refresh the pixmap after 0.2s
1690  d->delayResizeEventTimer->start( 200 );
1691  d->verticalScrollBarVisible = verticalScrollBar()->isVisible();
1692  d->horizontalScrollBarVisible = horizontalScrollBar()->isVisible();
1693 }
1694 
1695 void PageView::keyPressEvent( QKeyEvent * e )
1696 {
1697  e->accept();
1698 
1699  // if performing a selection or dyn zooming, disable keys handling
1700  if ( ( d->mouseSelecting && e->key() != Qt::Key_Escape ) || ( QApplication::mouseButtons () & Qt::MidButton ) )
1701  return;
1702 
1703  // if viewport is moving, disable keys handling
1704  if ( d->viewportMoveActive )
1705  return;
1706 
1707  // move/scroll page by using keys
1708  switch ( e->key() )
1709  {
1710  case Qt::Key_J:
1711  case Qt::Key_K:
1712  case Qt::Key_Down:
1713  case Qt::Key_PageDown:
1714  case Qt::Key_Up:
1715  case Qt::Key_PageUp:
1716  case Qt::Key_Backspace:
1717  if ( e->key() == Qt::Key_Down
1718  || e->key() == Qt::Key_PageDown
1719  || e->key() == Qt::Key_J )
1720  {
1721  bool singleStep = e->key() == Qt::Key_Down || e->key() == Qt::Key_J;
1722  slotScrollDown( singleStep );
1723  }
1724  else
1725  {
1726  bool singleStep = e->key() == Qt::Key_Up || e->key() == Qt::Key_K;
1727  slotScrollUp( singleStep );
1728  }
1729  break;
1730  case Qt::Key_Left:
1731  case Qt::Key_H:
1732  if ( horizontalScrollBar()->maximum() == 0 )
1733  {
1734  //if we cannot scroll we go to the previous page vertically
1735  int next_page = d->document->currentPage() - viewColumns();
1736  d->document->setViewportPage(next_page);
1737  }
1738  else
1739  horizontalScrollBar()->triggerAction( QScrollBar::SliderSingleStepSub );
1740  break;
1741  case Qt::Key_Right:
1742  case Qt::Key_L:
1743  if ( horizontalScrollBar()->maximum() == 0 )
1744  {
1745  //if we cannot scroll we advance the page vertically
1746  int next_page = d->document->currentPage() + viewColumns();
1747  d->document->setViewportPage(next_page);
1748  }
1749  else
1750  horizontalScrollBar()->triggerAction( QScrollBar::SliderSingleStepAdd );
1751  break;
1752  case Qt::Key_Escape:
1753  emit escPressed();
1754  selectionClear( d->tableDividersGuessed ? ClearOnlyDividers : ClearAllSelection );
1755  d->mousePressPos = QPoint();
1756  if ( d->aPrevAction )
1757  {
1758  d->aPrevAction->trigger();
1759  d->aPrevAction = 0;
1760  }
1761  break;
1762  case Qt::Key_Shift:
1763  case Qt::Key_Control:
1764  if ( d->autoScrollTimer )
1765  {
1766  if ( d->autoScrollTimer->isActive() )
1767  d->autoScrollTimer->stop();
1768  else
1769  slotAutoScoll();
1770  return;
1771  }
1772  // else fall trhough
1773  default:
1774  e->ignore();
1775  return;
1776  }
1777  // if a known key has been pressed, stop scrolling the page
1778  if ( d->autoScrollTimer )
1779  {
1780  d->scrollIncrement = 0;
1781  d->autoScrollTimer->stop();
1782  }
1783 }
1784 
1785 void PageView::keyReleaseEvent( QKeyEvent * e )
1786 {
1787  e->accept();
1788 
1789  if ( d->annotator && d->annotator->active() )
1790  {
1791  if ( d->annotator->routeKeyEvent( e ) )
1792  return;
1793  }
1794 
1795  if ( e->key() == Qt::Key_Escape && d->autoScrollTimer )
1796  {
1797  d->scrollIncrement = 0;
1798  d->autoScrollTimer->stop();
1799  }
1800 }

1802 void PageView::inputMethodEvent( QInputMethodEvent * e )
1803 {
1804  Q_UNUSED(e)
1805 }
1806 
1807 static QPoint rotateInRect( const QPoint &rotated, Okular::Rotation rotation )
1808 {
1809  QPoint ret;
1810 
1811  switch ( rotation )
1812  {
1813  case Okular::Rotation90:
1814  ret = QPoint( rotated.y(), -rotated.x() );
1815  break;
1816  case Okular::Rotation180:
1817  ret = QPoint( -rotated.x(), -rotated.y() );
1818  break;
1819  case Okular::Rotation270:
1820  ret = QPoint( -rotated.y(), rotated.x() );
1821  break;
1822  case Okular::Rotation0: // no modifications
1823  default: // other cases
1824  ret = rotated;
1825  }
1826 
1827  return ret;
1828 }

1830 void PageView::tabletEvent( QTabletEvent * e )
1831 {
1832  // Ignore tablet events that we don't care about
1833  if ( !( e->type() == QEvent::TabletPress ||
1834  e->type() == QEvent::TabletRelease ||
1835  e->type() == QEvent::TabletMove ) )
1836  {
1837  e->ignore();
1838  return;
1839  }
1840 
1841  // Determine pen state
1842  bool penReleased = false;
1843  if ( e->type() == QEvent::TabletPress )
1844  {
1845  d->penDown = true;
1846  }
1847  if ( e->type() == QEvent::TabletRelease )
1848  {
1849  d->penDown = false;
1850  penReleased = true;
1851  }
1852 
1853  // If we're editing an annotation and the tablet pen is either down or just released
1854  // then dispatch event to annotator
1855  if ( d->annotator && d->annotator->active() && ( d->penDown || penReleased ) )
1856  {
1857  const QPoint eventPos = contentAreaPoint( e->pos() );
1858  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
1859  const QPoint localOriginInGlobal = mapToGlobal( QPoint(0,0) );
1860 
1861  // routeTabletEvent will accept or ignore event as appropriate
1862  d->annotator->routeTabletEvent( e, pageItem, localOriginInGlobal );
1863  } else {
1864  e->ignore();
1865  }
1866 }
1867 
1868 void PageView::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent * e )
1869 {
1870  // don't perform any mouse action when no document is shown
1871  if ( d->items.isEmpty() )
1872  return;
1873 
1874  // don't perform any mouse action when viewport is autoscrolling
1875  if ( d->viewportMoveActive )
1876  return;
1877 
1878  // if holding mouse mid button, perform zoom
1879  if ( e->buttons() & Qt::MidButton )
1880  {
1881  int mouseY = e->globalPos().y();
1882  int deltaY = d->mouseMidLastY - mouseY;
1883 
1884  // wrap mouse from top to bottom
1885  const QRect mouseContainer = KGlobalSettings::desktopGeometry( this );
1886  const int absDeltaY = abs(deltaY);
1887  if ( absDeltaY > mouseContainer.height() / 2 )
1888  {
1889  deltaY = mouseContainer.height() - absDeltaY;
1890  }
1891 
1892  const float upperZoomLimit = d->document->supportsTiles() ? 15.99 : 3.99;
1893  if ( mouseY <= mouseContainer.top() + 4 &&
1894  d->zoomFactor < upperZoomLimit )
1895  {
1896  mouseY = mouseContainer.bottom() - 5;
1897  QCursor::setPos( e->globalPos().x(), mouseY );
1898  }
1899  // wrap mouse from bottom to top
1900  else if ( mouseY >= mouseContainer.bottom() - 4 &&
1901  d->zoomFactor > 0.101 )
1902  {
1903  mouseY = mouseContainer.top() + 5;
1904  QCursor::setPos( e->globalPos().x(), mouseY );
1905  }
1906  // remember last position
1907  d->mouseMidLastY = mouseY;
1908 
1909  // update zoom level, perform zoom and redraw
1910  if ( deltaY )
1911  {
1912  d->zoomFactor *= ( 1.0 + ( (double)deltaY / 500.0 ) );
1913  updateZoom( ZoomRefreshCurrent );
1914  viewport()->repaint();
1915  }
1916  return;
1917  }
1918 
1919  const QPoint eventPos = contentAreaPoint( e->pos() );
1920 
1921  // if we're editing an annotation, dispatch event to it
1922  if ( d->annotator && d->annotator->active() )
1923  {
1924  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
1925  updateCursor( eventPos );
1926  d->annotator->routeMouseEvent( e, pageItem );
1927  return;
1928  }
1929 
1930  bool leftButton = (e->buttons() == Qt::LeftButton);
1931  bool rightButton = (e->buttons() == Qt::RightButton);
1932  switch ( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() )
1933  {
1934  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Browse:
1935  if ( leftButton )
1936  {
1937  d->leftClickTimer.stop();
1938 
1939  if ( d->mouseAnn )
1940  {
1941  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
1942  if ( pageItem )
1943  {
1944  const QRect & itemRect = pageItem->uncroppedGeometry();
1945  QPoint newpos = eventPos - itemRect.topLeft();
1946  QPoint p( newpos - d->mouseAnnPos );
1947  QPointF pf( rotateInRect( p, pageItem->page()->rotation() ) );
1948  if ( pageItem->page()->rotation() % 2 == 0 )
1949  {
1950  pf.rx() /= pageItem->uncroppedWidth();
1951  pf.ry() /= pageItem->uncroppedHeight();
1952  }
1953  else
1954  {
1955  pf.rx() /= pageItem->uncroppedHeight();
1956  pf.ry() /= pageItem->uncroppedWidth();
1957  }
1958 
1959  d->document->translatePageAnnotation(d->mouseAnnPageNum, d->mouseAnn, Okular::NormalizedPoint( pf.x(), pf.y() ) );
1960  d->mouseAnnPos = newpos;
1961  }
1962  }
1963  // drag page
1964  else if ( !d->mouseGrabPos.isNull() )
1965  {
1966  setCursor( Qt::ClosedHandCursor );
1967 
1968  QPoint mousePos = e->globalPos();
1969  QPoint delta = d->mouseGrabPos - mousePos;
1970 
1971  // wrap mouse from top to bottom
1972  const QRect mouseContainer = KGlobalSettings::desktopGeometry( this );
1973  // If the delta is huge it probably means we just wrapped in that direction
1974  const QPoint absDelta(abs(delta.x()), abs(delta.y()));
1975  if ( absDelta.y() > mouseContainer.height() / 2 )
1976  {
1977  delta.setY(mouseContainer.height() - absDelta.y());
1978  }
1979  if ( absDelta.x() > mouseContainer.width() / 2 )
1980  {
1981  delta.setX(mouseContainer.width() - absDelta.x());
1982  }
1983  if ( mousePos.y() <= mouseContainer.top() + 4 &&
1984  verticalScrollBar()->value() < verticalScrollBar()->maximum() - 10 )
1985  {
1986  mousePos.setY( mouseContainer.bottom() - 5 );
1987  QCursor::setPos( mousePos );
1988  }
1989  // wrap mouse from bottom to top
1990  else if ( mousePos.y() >= mouseContainer.bottom() - 4 &&
1991  verticalScrollBar()->value() > 10 )
1992  {
1993  mousePos.setY( mouseContainer.top() + 5 );
1994  QCursor::setPos( mousePos );
1995  }
1996  // remember last position
1997  d->mouseGrabPos = mousePos;
1998 
1999  // scroll page by position increment
2000  scrollTo( horizontalScrollBar()->value() + delta.x(), verticalScrollBar()->value() + delta.y() );
2001  }
2002  }
2003  else if ( rightButton && !d->mousePressPos.isNull() && d->aMouseSelect )
2004  {
2005  // if mouse moves 5 px away from the press point, switch to 'selection'
2006  int deltaX = d->mousePressPos.x() - e->globalPos().x(),
2007  deltaY = d->mousePressPos.y() - e->globalPos().y();
2008  if ( deltaX > 5 || deltaX < -5 || deltaY > 5 || deltaY < -5 )
2009  {
2010  d->aPrevAction = d->aMouseNormal;
2011  d->aMouseSelect->trigger();
2012  QPoint newPos = eventPos + QPoint( deltaX, deltaY );
2013  selectionStart( newPos, palette().color( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight ).light( 120 ), false );
2014  updateSelection( eventPos );
2015  break;
2016  }
2017  }
2018  else
2019  {
2020  // only hovering the page, so update the cursor
2021  updateCursor();
2022  }
2023  break;
2024 
2025  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Zoom:
2026  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::RectSelect:
2027  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::TableSelect:
2028  // set second corner of selection
2029  if ( d->mouseSelecting )
2030  updateSelection( eventPos );
2031  break;
2032 
2033  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Magnifier:
2034  if ( e->buttons() ) // if any button is pressed at all
2035  {
2036  moveMagnifier( e->pos() );
2037  updateMagnifier( eventPos );
2038  }
2039  break;
2040 
2041  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::TextSelect:
2042  // if mouse moves 5 px away from the press point and the document soupports text extraction, do 'textselection'
2043  if ( !d->mouseTextSelecting && !d->mousePressPos.isNull() && d->document->supportsSearching() && ( ( eventPos - d->mouseSelectPos ).manhattanLength() > 5 ) )
2044  {
2045  d->mouseTextSelecting = true;
2046  }
2047  updateSelection( eventPos );
2048  updateCursor();
2049  break;
2050  }
2051 }
2052 
2053 void PageView::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent * e )
2054 {
2055  // don't perform any mouse action when no document is shown
2056  if ( d->items.isEmpty() )
2057  return;
2058 
2059  // if performing a selection or dyn zooming, disable mouse press
2060  if ( d->mouseSelecting || ( e->button() != Qt::MidButton && ( e->buttons() & Qt::MidButton) ) || d->viewportMoveActive )
2061  return;
2062 
2063  // if the page is scrolling, stop it
2064  if ( d->autoScrollTimer )
2065  {
2066  d->scrollIncrement = 0;
2067  d->autoScrollTimer->stop();
2068  }
2069 
2070  // if pressing mid mouse button while not doing other things, begin 'continuous zoom' mode
2071  if ( e->button() == Qt::MidButton )
2072  {
2073  d->mouseMidLastY = e->globalPos().y();
2074  setCursor( Qt::SizeVerCursor );
2075  return;
2076  }
2077 
2078  const QPoint eventPos = contentAreaPoint( e->pos() );
2079 
2080  // if we're editing an annotation, dispatch event to it
2081  if ( d->annotator && d->annotator->active() )
2082  {
2083  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
2084  d->annotator->routeMouseEvent( e, pageItem );
2085  return;
2086  }
2087 
2088  // trigger history navigation for additional mouse buttons
2089  if ( e->button() == Qt::XButton1 )
2090  {
2091  emit mouseBackButtonClick();
2092  return;
2093  }
2094  if ( e->button() == Qt::XButton2 )
2095  {
2096  emit mouseForwardButtonClick();
2097  return;
2098  }
2099 
2100  // update press / 'start drag' mouse position
2101  d->mousePressPos = e->globalPos();
2102 
2103  // handle mode dependant mouse press actions
2104  bool leftButton = e->button() == Qt::LeftButton,
2105  rightButton = e->button() == Qt::RightButton;
2106 
2107 // Not sure we should erase the selection when clicking with left.
2108  if ( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() != Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::TextSelect )
2109  textSelectionClear();
2110 
2111  switch ( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() )
2112  {
2113  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Browse: // drag start / click / link following
2114  if ( leftButton )
2115  {
2116  PageViewItem * pageItem = 0;
2117  if ( ( e->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier ) && ( pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() ) ) )
2118  {
2119  // find out normalized mouse coords inside current item
2120  const QRect & itemRect = pageItem->uncroppedGeometry();
2121  double nX = pageItem->absToPageX(eventPos.x());
2122  double nY = pageItem->absToPageY(eventPos.y());
2123  const Okular::ObjectRect * orect = pageItem->page()->objectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::OAnnotation, nX, nY, itemRect.width(), itemRect.height() );
2124  d->mouseAnnPos = eventPos - itemRect.topLeft();
2125  if ( orect )
2126  d->mouseAnn = ( (Okular::AnnotationObjectRect *)orect )->annotation();
2127  // consider no annotation caught if its type is not movable
2128  if ( d->mouseAnn && !d->mouseAnn->canBeMoved() )
2129  d->mouseAnn = 0;
2130  }
2131  if ( d->mouseAnn )
2132  {
2133  d->mouseAnn->setFlags( d->mouseAnn->flags() | Okular::Annotation::BeingMoved );
2134  d->mouseAnnPageNum = pageItem->pageNumber();
2135  }
2136  else
2137  {
2138  d->mouseGrabPos = d->mouseOnRect ? QPoint() : d->mousePressPos;
2139  if ( !d->mouseOnRect )
2140  d->leftClickTimer.start( QApplication::doubleClickInterval() + 10 );
2141  }
2142  }
2143  else if ( rightButton )
2144  {
2145  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
2146  if ( pageItem )
2147  {
2148  // find out normalized mouse coords inside current item
2149  const QRect & itemRect = pageItem->uncroppedGeometry();
2150  double nX = pageItem->absToPageX(eventPos.x());
2151  double nY = pageItem->absToPageY(eventPos.y());
2152 
2153  const QLinkedList< const Okular::ObjectRect *> orects = pageItem->page()->objectRects( Okular::ObjectRect::OAnnotation, nX, nY, itemRect.width(), itemRect.height() );
2154 
2155  if ( !orects.isEmpty() )
2156  {
2157  AnnotationPopup popup( d->document, AnnotationPopup::MultiAnnotationMode, this );
2158 
2159  foreach ( const Okular::ObjectRect * orect, orects )
2160  {
2161  Okular::Annotation * ann = ( (Okular::AnnotationObjectRect *)orect )->annotation();
2162  if ( ann && (ann->subType() != Okular::Annotation::AWidget) )
2163  popup.addAnnotation( ann, pageItem->pageNumber() );
2164 
2165  }
2166 
2167  connect( &popup, SIGNAL(openAnnotationWindow(Okular::Annotation*,int)),
2168  this, SLOT(openAnnotationWindow(Okular::Annotation*,int)) );
2169 
2170  popup.exec( e->globalPos() );
2171  }
2172  }
2173  }
2174  break;
2175 
2176  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Zoom: // set first corner of the zoom rect
2177  if ( leftButton )
2178  selectionStart( eventPos, palette().color( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight ), false );
2179  else if ( rightButton )
2180  updateZoom( ZoomOut );
2181  break;
2182 
2183  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Magnifier:
2184  moveMagnifier( e->pos() );
2185  d->magnifierView->show();
2186  updateMagnifier( eventPos );
2187  break;
2188 
2189  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::RectSelect: // set first corner of the selection rect
2190  if ( leftButton )
2191  {
2192  selectionStart( eventPos, palette().color( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight ).light( 120 ), false );
2193  }
2194  break;
2195  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::TableSelect:
2196  if ( leftButton )
2197  {
2198  if (d->tableSelectionParts.isEmpty())
2199  {
2200  selectionStart( eventPos, palette().color( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight ).light( 120 ), false );
2201  } else {
2202  QRect updatedRect;
2203  foreach (const TableSelectionPart &tsp, d->tableSelectionParts) {
2204  QRect selectionPartRect = tsp.rectInItem.geometry(tsp.item->uncroppedWidth(), tsp.item->uncroppedHeight());
2205  selectionPartRect.translate( tsp.item->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft () );
2206 
2207  // This will update the whole table rather than just the added/removed divider
2208  // (which can span more than one part).
2209  updatedRect = updatedRect.united(selectionPartRect);
2210 
2211  if (!selectionPartRect.contains(eventPos))
2212  continue;
2213 
2214  // At this point it's clear we're either adding or removing a divider manually, so obviously the user is happy with the guess (if any).
2215  d->tableDividersGuessed = false;
2216 
2217  // There's probably a neat trick to finding which edge it's closest to,
2218  // but this way has the advantage of simplicity.
2219  const int fromLeft = abs(selectionPartRect.left() - eventPos.x());
2220  const int fromRight = abs(selectionPartRect.left() + selectionPartRect.width() - eventPos.x());
2221  const int fromTop = abs(selectionPartRect.top() - eventPos.y());
2222  const int fromBottom = abs(selectionPartRect.top() + selectionPartRect.height() - eventPos.y());
2223  const int colScore = fromTop<fromBottom ? fromTop : fromBottom;
2224  const int rowScore = fromLeft<fromRight ? fromLeft : fromRight;
2225 
2226  if (colScore < rowScore) {
2227  bool deleted=false;
2228  for(int i=0; i<d->tableSelectionCols.length(); i++) {
2229  const double col = (d->tableSelectionCols[i] - tsp.rectInSelection.left) / (tsp.rectInSelection.right - tsp.rectInSelection.left);
2230  const int colX = selectionPartRect.left() + col * selectionPartRect.width() + 0.5;
2231  if (abs(colX - eventPos.x())<=3) {
2232  d->tableSelectionCols.removeAt(i);
2233  deleted=true;
2234 
2235  break;
2236  }
2237  }
2238  if (!deleted) {
2239  double col = eventPos.x() - selectionPartRect.left();
2240  col /= selectionPartRect.width(); // at this point, it's normalised within the part
2241  col *= (tsp.rectInSelection.right - tsp.rectInSelection.left);
2242  col += tsp.rectInSelection.left; // at this point, it's normalised within the whole table
2243 
2244  d->tableSelectionCols.append(col);
2245  qSort(d->tableSelectionCols);
2246  }
2247  } else {
2248  bool deleted=false;
2249  for(int i=0; i<d->tableSelectionRows.length(); i++) {
2250  const double row = (d->tableSelectionRows[i] - tsp.rectInSelection.top) / (tsp.rectInSelection.bottom - tsp.rectInSelection.top);
2251  const int rowY = selectionPartRect.top() + row * selectionPartRect.height() + 0.5;
2252  if (abs(rowY - eventPos.y())<=3) {
2253  d->tableSelectionRows.removeAt(i);
2254  deleted=true;
2255 
2256  break;
2257  }
2258  }
2259  if (!deleted) {
2260  double row = eventPos.y() - selectionPartRect.top();
2261  row /= selectionPartRect.height(); // at this point, it's normalised within the part
2262  row *= (tsp.rectInSelection.bottom - tsp.rectInSelection.top);
2263  row += tsp.rectInSelection.top; // at this point, it's normalised within the whole table
2264 
2265  d->tableSelectionRows.append(row);
2266  qSort(d->tableSelectionRows);
2267  }
2268  }
2269  }
2270  updatedRect.translate( -contentAreaPosition() );
2271  viewport()->update( updatedRect );
2272  }
2273  }
2274  break;
2275  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::TextSelect:
2276  d->mouseSelectPos = eventPos;
2277  if ( !rightButton )
2278  {
2279  textSelectionClear();
2280  }
2281  break;
2282  }
2283 }
2284 
2285 void PageView::mouseReleaseEvent( QMouseEvent * e )
2286 {
2287  // stop the drag scrolling
2288  d->dragScrollTimer.stop();
2289 
2290  d->leftClickTimer.stop();
2291 
2292  // don't perform any mouse action when no document is shown..
2293  if ( d->items.isEmpty() )
2294  {
2295  // ..except for right Clicks (emitted even it viewport is empty)
2296  if ( e->button() == Qt::RightButton )
2297  emit rightClick( 0, e->globalPos() );
2298  return;
2299  }
2300 
2301  // don't perform any mouse action when viewport is autoscrolling
2302  if ( d->viewportMoveActive )
2303  return;
2304 
2305  const QPoint eventPos = contentAreaPoint( e->pos() );
2306 
2307  // handle mode indepent mid buttom zoom
2308  if ( e->button() == Qt::MidButton )
2309  {
2310  // request pixmaps since it was disabled during drag
2311  slotRequestVisiblePixmaps();
2312  // the cursor may now be over a link.. update it
2313  updateCursor( eventPos );
2314  return;
2315  }
2316 
2317  // if we're editing an annotation, dispatch event to it
2318  if ( d->annotator && d->annotator->active() )
2319  {
2320  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
2321  d->annotator->routeMouseEvent( e, pageItem );
2322  return;
2323  }
2324 
2325  if ( d->mouseAnn )
2326  {
2327  // Just finished to move the annotation
2328  d->mouseAnn->setFlags( d->mouseAnn->flags() & ~Okular::Annotation::BeingMoved );
2329  d->document->translatePageAnnotation(d->mouseAnnPageNum, d->mouseAnn, Okular::NormalizedPoint( 0.0, 0.0 ) );
2330  setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
2331  d->mouseAnn = 0;
2332  }
2333 
2334  bool leftButton = e->button() == Qt::LeftButton;
2335  bool rightButton = e->button() == Qt::RightButton;
2336  switch ( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() )
2337  {
2338  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Browse:{
2339  // return the cursor to its normal state after dragging
2340  if ( cursor().shape() == Qt::ClosedHandCursor )
2341  updateCursor( eventPos );
2342 
2343  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
2344  const QPoint pressPos = contentAreaPoint( mapFromGlobal( d->mousePressPos ) );
2345  const PageViewItem * pageItemPressPos = pickItemOnPoint( pressPos.x(), pressPos.y() );
2346 
2347  // if the mouse has not moved since the press, that's a -click-
2348  if ( leftButton && pageItem && pageItem == pageItemPressPos &&
2349  ( (d->mousePressPos - e->globalPos()).manhattanLength() < QApplication::startDragDistance() ) )
2350  {
2351  double nX = pageItem->absToPageX(eventPos.x());
2352  double nY = pageItem->absToPageY(eventPos.y());
2353  const Okular::ObjectRect * rect;
2354  rect = pageItem->page()->objectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::Action, nX, nY, pageItem->uncroppedWidth(), pageItem->uncroppedHeight() );
2355  if ( rect )
2356  {
2357  // handle click over a link
2358  const Okular::Action * action = static_cast< const Okular::Action * >( rect->object() );
2359  d->document->processAction( action );
2360  }
2361  else if ( e->modifiers() == Qt::ShiftModifier )
2362  {
2363  // TODO: find a better way to activate the source reference "links"
2364  // for the moment they are activated with Shift + left click
2365  // Search the nearest source reference.
2366  rect = pageItem->page()->objectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::SourceRef, nX, nY, pageItem->uncroppedWidth(), pageItem->uncroppedHeight() );
2367  if ( !rect )
2368  {
2369  static const double s_minDistance = 0.025; // FIXME?: empirical value?
2370  double distance = 0.0;
2371  rect = pageItem->page()->nearestObjectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::SourceRef, nX, nY, pageItem->uncroppedWidth(), pageItem->uncroppedHeight(), &distance );
2372  if ( rect && ( distance > s_minDistance ) )
2373  rect = 0;
2374  }
2375  if ( rect )
2376  {
2377  const Okular::SourceReference * ref = static_cast< const Okular::SourceReference * >( rect->object() );
2378  d->document->processSourceReference( ref );
2379  }
2380  else
2381  {
2382  const Okular::SourceReference * ref = d->document->dynamicSourceReference( pageItem-> pageNumber(), nX * pageItem->page()->width(), nY * pageItem->page()->height() );
2383  if ( ref )
2384  {
2385  d->document->processSourceReference( ref );
2386  delete ref;
2387  }
2388  }
2389  }
2390  else
2391  {
2392  Okular::Annotation *ann = 0;
2393 
2394  rect = pageItem->page()->objectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::OAnnotation, nX, nY, pageItem->uncroppedWidth(), pageItem->uncroppedHeight() );
2395  if ( rect )
2396  ann = ( (Okular::AnnotationObjectRect *)rect )->annotation();
2397 
2398  if ( ann )
2399  {
2400  if ( ann->subType() == Okular::Annotation::AMovie )
2401  {
2402  VideoWidget *vw = pageItem->videoWidgets().value( static_cast<Okular::MovieAnnotation*>( ann )->movie() );
2403  vw->show();
2404  vw->play();
2405  }
2406  else if ( ann->subType() == Okular::Annotation::AScreen )
2407  {
2408  d->document->processAction( static_cast<Okular::ScreenAnnotation*>( ann )->action() );
2409  }
2410  }
2411 #if 0
2412  // a link can move us to another page or even to another document, there's no point in trying to
2413  // process the click on the image once we have processes the click on the link
2414  rect = pageItem->page()->objectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::Image, nX, nY, pageItem->width(), pageItem->height() );
2415  if ( rect )
2416  {
2417  // handle click over a image
2418  }
2419 /* Enrico and me have decided this is not worth the trouble it generates
2420  else
2421  {
2422  // if not on a rect, the click selects the page
2423  // if ( pageItem->pageNumber() != (int)d->document->currentPage() )
2424  d->document->setViewportPage( pageItem->pageNumber(), this );
2425  }*/
2426 #endif
2427  }
2428  }
2429  else if ( rightButton )
2430  {
2431  if ( pageItem && pageItem == pageItemPressPos &&
2432  ( (d->mousePressPos - e->globalPos()).manhattanLength() < QApplication::startDragDistance() ) )
2433  {
2434  double nX = pageItem->absToPageX(eventPos.x());
2435  double nY = pageItem->absToPageY(eventPos.y());
2436  const Okular::ObjectRect * rect;

2438  if ( rect )

2442  // creating the menu and its actions

2455  {
2456  d->document->processAction( link );
2457  }
2458  else if ( res == actCopyLinkLocation )
2459  {

2461  QClipboard *cb = QApplication::clipboard();

2467  {
2468  Okular::AudioPlayer::instance()->stopPlaybacks();
2469  }
2470  }
2471  }
2472  else
2473  {
2474  // a link can move us to another page or even to another document, there's no point in trying to
2475  // process the click on the image once we have processes the click on the link
2476  rect = pageItem->page()->objectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::Image, nX, nY, pageItem->uncroppedWidth(), pageItem->uncroppedHeight() );
2477  if ( rect )
2478  {
2479  // handle right click over a image
2480  }
2481  else
2482  {
2483  // right click (if not within 5 px of the press point, the mode
2484  // had been already changed to 'Selection' instead of 'Normal')
2485  emit rightClick( pageItem->page(), e->globalPos() );
2486  }
2487  }
2488  }
2489  else
2490  {
2491  // right click (if not within 5 px of the press point, the mode
2492  // had been already changed to 'Selection' instead of 'Normal')
2493  emit rightClick( pageItem ? pageItem->page() : 0, e->globalPos() );
2494  }
2495  }
2496  }break;
2497 
2498  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Zoom:
2499  // if a selection rect has been defined, zoom into it
2500  if ( leftButton && d->mouseSelecting )
2501  {
2502  QRect selRect = d->mouseSelectionRect.normalized();
2503  if ( selRect.width() <= 8 && selRect.height() <= 8 )
2504  {
2505  selectionClear();
2506  break;
2507  }
2508 
2509  // find out new zoom ratio and normalized view center (relative to the contentsRect)
2510  double zoom = qMin( (double)viewport()->width() / (double)selRect.width(), (double)viewport()->height() / (double)selRect.height() );
2511  double nX = (double)(selRect.left() + selRect.right()) / (2.0 * (double)contentAreaWidth());
2512  double nY = (double)(selRect.top() + selRect.bottom()) / (2.0 * (double)contentAreaHeight());
2513 
2514  const float upperZoomLimit = d->document->supportsTiles() ? 16.0 : 4.0;
2515  if ( d->zoomFactor <= upperZoomLimit || zoom <= 1.0 )
2516  {
2517  d->zoomFactor *= zoom;
2518  viewport()->setUpdatesEnabled( false );
2519  updateZoom( ZoomRefreshCurrent );
2520  viewport()->setUpdatesEnabled( true );
2521  }
2522 
2523  // recenter view and update the viewport
2524  center( (int)(nX * contentAreaWidth()), (int)(nY * contentAreaHeight()) );
2525  viewport()->update();
2526 
2527  // hide message box and delete overlay window
2528  selectionClear();
2529  }

2531

2533  d->magnifierView->hide();

2535

2537  {
2538  // if mouse is released and selection is null this is a rightClick
2539  if ( rightButton && !d->mouseSelecting )
2540  {
2541  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
2542  emit rightClick( pageItem ? pageItem->page() : 0, e->globalPos() );
2543  break;
2544  }
2545 
2546  // if a selection is defined, display a popup
2547  if ( (!leftButton && !d->aPrevAction) || (!rightButton && d->aPrevAction) ||
2548  !d->mouseSelecting )
2549  break;
2550 
2551  QRect selectionRect = d->mouseSelectionRect.normalized();
2552  if ( selectionRect.width() <= 8 && selectionRect.height() <= 8 )
2553  {
2554  selectionClear();
2555  if ( d->aPrevAction )
2556  {
2557  d->aPrevAction->trigger();
2558  d->aPrevAction = 0;
2559  }
2560  break;
2561  }
2562 
2563  // if we support text generation
2564  QString selectedText;
2565  if (d->document->supportsSearching())

2568  const Okular::Page * okularPage=0;
2569  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator iIt = d->items.constBegin(), iEnd = d->items.constEnd();
2570  for ( ; iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
2571  {
2572  PageViewItem * item = *iIt;
2573  if ( !item->isVisible() )
2574  continue;
2575

2588  rects.append( Okular::NormalizedRect( relativeRect, item->uncroppedWidth(), item->uncroppedHeight() ) );
2589  selectedText += okularPage->text( &rects );
2590  }
2591  }
2592  }
2593
