2596  QAction *textToClipboard = 0, *speakText = 0, *imageToClipboard = 0, *imageToFile = 0;
2597  if ( d->document->supportsSearching() && !selectedText.isEmpty() )
2598  {
2599  menu.addTitle( i18np( "Text (1 character)", "Text (%1 characters)", selectedText.length() ) );
2600  textToClipboard = menu.addAction( KIcon("edit-copy"), i18n( "Copy to Clipboard" ) );
2601  bool copyAllowed = d->document->isAllowed( Okular::AllowCopy );
2602  if ( !copyAllowed )
2603  {
2604  textToClipboard->setEnabled( false );
2605  textToClipboard->setText( i18n("Copy forbidden by DRM") );
2606  }
2607  if ( Okular::Settings::useKTTSD() )
2608  speakText = menu.addAction( KIcon("text-speak"), i18n( "Speak Text" ) );
2609  if ( copyAllowed )
2610  {
2611  addWebShortcutsMenu( &menu, selectedText );
2612  }
2613  }
2614  menu.addTitle( i18n( "Image (%1 by %2 pixels)", selectionRect.width(), selectionRect.height() ) );
2615  imageToClipboard = menu.addAction( KIcon("image-x-generic"), i18n( "Copy to Clipboard" ) );
2616  imageToFile = menu.addAction( KIcon("document-save"), i18n( "Save to File..." ) );
2617  QAction *choice = menu.exec( e->globalPos() );
2618  // check if the user really selected an action
2619  if ( choice )
2620  {
2621  // IMAGE operation chosen
2622  if ( choice == imageToClipboard || choice == imageToFile )
2623  {
2624  // renders page into a pixmap
2625  QPixmap copyPix( selectionRect.width(), selectionRect.height() );
2626  QPainter copyPainter( &copyPix );
2627  copyPainter.translate( -selectionRect.left(), -selectionRect.top() );
2628  drawDocumentOnPainter( selectionRect, &copyPainter );
2629  copyPainter.end();
2630 
2631  if ( choice == imageToClipboard )
2632  {
2633  // [2] copy pixmap to clipboard
2634  QClipboard *cb = QApplication::clipboard();
2635  cb->setPixmap( copyPix, QClipboard::Clipboard );
2636  if ( cb->supportsSelection() )
2637  cb->setPixmap( copyPix, QClipboard::Selection );
2638  d->messageWindow->display( i18n( "Image [%1x%2] copied to clipboard.", copyPix.width(), copyPix.height() ) );
2639  }
2640  else if ( choice == imageToFile )
2641  {
2642  // [3] save pixmap to file
2643  QString fileName = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName( KUrl(), "image/png image/jpeg", this, QString(),
2644  KFileDialog::ConfirmOverwrite );
2645  if ( fileName.isEmpty() )
2646  d->messageWindow->display( i18n( "File not saved." ), QString(), PageViewMessage::Warning );
2647  else
2648  {
2649  KMimeType::Ptr mime = KMimeType::findByUrl( fileName );
2650  QString type;
2651  if ( !mime || mime == KMimeType::defaultMimeTypePtr() )
2652  type = "PNG";
2653  else
2654  type = mime->name().section( '/', -1 ).toUpper();
2655  copyPix.save( fileName, qPrintable( type ) );
2656  d->messageWindow->display( i18n( "Image [%1x%2] saved to %3 file.", copyPix.width(), copyPix.height(), type ) );
2657  }
2658  }
2659  }
2660  // TEXT operation chosen
2661  else
2662  {
2663  if ( choice == textToClipboard )
2664  {
2665  // [1] copy text to clipboard
2666  QClipboard *cb = QApplication::clipboard();
2667  cb->setText( selectedText, QClipboard::Clipboard );
2668  if ( cb->supportsSelection() )
2669  cb->setText( selectedText, QClipboard::Selection );
2670  }
2671  else if ( choice == speakText )
2672  {
2673  // [2] speech selection using KTTSD
2674  d->tts()->say( selectedText );
2675  }
2676  }
2677  }
2678  // clear widget selection and invalidate rect
2679  selectionClear();
2680 
2681  // restore previous action if came from it using right button
2682  if ( d->aPrevAction )
2683  {
2684  d->aPrevAction->trigger();
2685  d->aPrevAction = 0;
2686  }
2687  }break;
2688 
2689  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::TableSelect:
2690  {
2691  // if mouse is released and selection is null this is a rightClick
2692  if ( rightButton && !d->mouseSelecting )
2693  {
2694  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( eventPos.x(), eventPos.y() );
2695  emit rightClick( pageItem ? pageItem->page() : 0, e->globalPos() );
2696  break;
2697  }
2698 
2699  QRect selectionRect = d->mouseSelectionRect.normalized();
2700  if ( selectionRect.width() <= 8 && selectionRect.height() <= 8 && d->tableSelectionParts.isEmpty() )
2701  {
2702  selectionClear();
2703  if ( d->aPrevAction )
2704  {
2705  d->aPrevAction->trigger();
2706  d->aPrevAction = 0;
2707  }
2708  break;
2709  }
2710 
2711  if (d->mouseSelecting) {
2712  // break up the selection into page-relative pieces
2713  d->tableSelectionParts.clear();
2714  const Okular::Page * okularPage=0;
2715  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator iIt = d->items.constBegin(), iEnd = d->items.constEnd();
2716  for ( ; iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
2717  {
2718  PageViewItem * item = *iIt;
2719  if ( !item->isVisible() )
2720  continue;
2721 
2722  const QRect & itemRect = item->croppedGeometry();
2723  if ( selectionRect.intersects( itemRect ) )
2724  {
2725  // request the textpage if there isn't one
2726  okularPage= item->page();
2727  kWarning() << "checking if page" << item->pageNumber() << "has text:" << okularPage->hasTextPage();
2728  if ( !okularPage->hasTextPage() )
2729  d->document->requestTextPage( okularPage->number() );
2730  // grab text in the rect that intersects itemRect
2731  QRect rectInItem = selectionRect.intersect( itemRect );
2732  rectInItem.translate( -item->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft() );
2733  QRect rectInSelection = selectionRect.intersect( itemRect );
2734  rectInSelection.translate( -selectionRect.topLeft() );
2735  d->tableSelectionParts.append(
2736  TableSelectionPart(
2737  item,
2738  Okular::NormalizedRect( rectInItem, item->uncroppedWidth(), item->uncroppedHeight() ),
2739  Okular::NormalizedRect( rectInSelection, selectionRect.width(), selectionRect.height() )
2740  )
2741  );
2742  }
2743  }
2744 
2745  QRect updatedRect = d->mouseSelectionRect.normalized().adjusted( 0, 0, 1, 1 );
2746  updatedRect.translate( -contentAreaPosition() );
2747  d->mouseSelecting = false;
2748  d->mouseSelectionRect.setCoords( 0, 0, 0, 0 );
2749  d->tableSelectionCols.clear();
2750  d->tableSelectionRows.clear();
2751  guessTableDividers();
2752  viewport()->update( updatedRect );
2753  }
2754 
2755  if ( !d->document->isAllowed( Okular::AllowCopy ) ) {
2756  d->messageWindow->display( i18n("Copy forbidden by DRM"), QString(), PageViewMessage::Info, -1 );
2757  break;
2758  }
2759 
2760  QString selText;
2761  QString selHtml;
2762  QList<double> xs = d->tableSelectionCols;
2763  QList<double> ys = d->tableSelectionRows;
2764  xs.prepend(0.0);
2765  xs.append(1.0);
2766  ys.prepend(0.0);
2767  ys.append(1.0);
2768  selHtml = "<html><head>"
2769  "<meta content=\"text/html; charset=utf-8\" http-equiv=\"Content-Type\">"
2770  "</head><body><table>";
2771  for (int r=0; r+1<ys.length(); r++) {
2772  selHtml += "<tr>";
2773  for (int c=0; c+1<xs.length(); c++) {
2774  Okular::NormalizedRect cell(xs[c], ys[r], xs[c+1], ys[r+1]);
2775  if (c) selText += '\t';
2776  QString txt;
2777  foreach (const TableSelectionPart &tsp, d->tableSelectionParts) {
2778  // first, crop the cell to this part
2779  if (!tsp.rectInSelection.intersects(cell))
2780  continue;
2781  Okular::NormalizedRect cellPart = tsp.rectInSelection & cell; // intersection
2782 
2783  // second, convert it from table coordinates to part coordinates
2784  cellPart.left -= tsp.rectInSelection.left;
2785  cellPart.left /= (tsp.rectInSelection.right - tsp.rectInSelection.left);
2786  cellPart.right -= tsp.rectInSelection.left;
2787  cellPart.right /= (tsp.rectInSelection.right - tsp.rectInSelection.left);
2788  cellPart.top -= tsp.rectInSelection.top;
2789  cellPart.top /= (tsp.rectInSelection.bottom - tsp.rectInSelection.top);
2790  cellPart.bottom -= tsp.rectInSelection.top;
2791  cellPart.bottom /= (tsp.rectInSelection.bottom - tsp.rectInSelection.top);
2792 
2793  // third, convert from part coordinates to item coordinates
2794  cellPart.left *= (tsp.rectInItem.right - tsp.rectInItem.left);
2795  cellPart.left += tsp.rectInItem.left;
2796  cellPart.right *= (tsp.rectInItem.right - tsp.rectInItem.left);
2797  cellPart.right += tsp.rectInItem.left;
2798  cellPart.top *= (tsp.rectInItem.bottom - tsp.rectInItem.top);
2799  cellPart.top += tsp.rectInItem.top;
2800  cellPart.bottom *= (tsp.rectInItem.bottom - tsp.rectInItem.top);
2801  cellPart.bottom += tsp.rectInItem.top;
2802 
2803  // now get the text
2804  Okular::RegularAreaRect rects;
2805  rects.append( cellPart );
2806  txt += tsp.item->page()->text( &rects, Okular::TextPage::CentralPixelTextAreaInclusionBehaviour );
2807  }
2808  QString html = txt;
2809  selText += txt.replace('\n', ' ');
2810  html.replace('&', "&amp;").replace('<', "&lt;").replace('>', "&gt;");
2811  // Remove newlines, do not turn them into <br>, because
2812  // Excel interprets <br> within cell as new cell...
2813  html.replace('\n', " ");
2814  selHtml += "<td>"+html+"</td>";
2815  }
2816  selText += '\n';
2817  selHtml += "</tr>\n";
2818  }
2819  selHtml += "</table></body></html>\n";
2820 
2821 
2822  QClipboard *cb = QApplication::clipboard();
2823  QMimeData *md = new QMimeData();
2824  md->setText(selText);
2825  md->setHtml(selHtml);
2826  cb->setMimeData( md, QClipboard::Clipboard );
2827  if ( cb->supportsSelection() )
2828  cb->setMimeData( md, QClipboard::Selection );
2829 
2830  }break;
2831  case Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::TextSelect:
2832  if ( d->mouseTextSelecting )
2833  {
2834  d->mouseTextSelecting = false;
2835 // textSelectionClear();
2836  if ( d->document->isAllowed( Okular::AllowCopy ) )
2837  {
2838  const QString text = d->selectedText();
2839  if ( !text.isEmpty() )
2840  {
2841  QClipboard *cb = QApplication::clipboard();
2842  if ( cb->supportsSelection() )
2843  cb->setText( text, QClipboard::Selection );
2844  }
2845  }
2846  }
2847  else if ( !d->mousePressPos.isNull() && rightButton )
2848  {
2849  PageViewItem* item = pickItemOnPoint(eventPos.x(),eventPos.y());
2850  const Okular::Page *page;
2851  //if there is text selected in the page
2852  if (item && (page = item->page())->textSelection())
2853  {
2854  KMenu menu( this );
2855  QAction *textToClipboard = menu.addAction( KIcon( "edit-copy" ), i18n( "Copy Text" ) );
2856  QAction *speakText = 0;
2857  QAction *httpLink = 0;
2858  if ( Okular::Settings::useKTTSD() )
2859  speakText = menu.addAction( KIcon( "text-speak" ), i18n( "Speak Text" ) );
2860  if ( !d->document->isAllowed( Okular::AllowCopy ) )
2861  {
2862  textToClipboard->setEnabled( false );
2863  textToClipboard->setText( i18n("Copy forbidden by DRM") );
2864  }
2865  else
2866  {
2867  addWebShortcutsMenu( &menu, d->selectedText() );
2868  }
2869  const QString url = UrlUtils::getUrl( d->selectedText() );
2870  if ( !url.isEmpty() )
2871  {
2872  const QString squeezedText = KStringHandler::rsqueeze( url, 30 );
2873  httpLink = menu.addAction( i18n( "Go to '%1'", squeezedText ) );
2874  }
2875  QAction *choice = menu.exec( e->globalPos() );
2876  // check if the user really selected an action
2877  if ( choice )
2878  {
2879  if ( choice == textToClipboard )
2880  copyTextSelection();
2881  else if ( choice == speakText )
2882  {
2883  const QString text = d->selectedText();
2884  d->tts()->say( text );
2885  }
2886  else if ( choice == httpLink )
2887  new KRun( KUrl( url ), this );
2888  }
2889  }
2890  }
2891  break;
2892  }
2893 
2894  // reset mouse press / 'drag start' position
2895  d->mousePressPos = QPoint();
2896 }
2897 
2898 void PageView::guessTableDividers()
2899 {
2900  QList< QPair<double, int> > colTicks, rowTicks, colSelectionTicks, rowSelectionTicks;
2901 
2902  foreach ( const TableSelectionPart& tsp, d->tableSelectionParts )
2903  {
2904  // add ticks for the edges of this area...
2905  colSelectionTicks.append( qMakePair( tsp.rectInSelection.left, +1 ) );
2906  colSelectionTicks.append( qMakePair( tsp.rectInSelection.right, -1 ) );
2907  rowSelectionTicks.append( qMakePair( tsp.rectInSelection.top, +1 ) );
2908  rowSelectionTicks.append( qMakePair( tsp.rectInSelection.bottom, -1 ) );
2909 
2910  // get the words in this part
2911  Okular::RegularAreaRect rects;
2912  rects.append( tsp.rectInItem );
2913  const Okular::TextEntity::List words = tsp.item->page()->words( &rects, Okular::TextPage::CentralPixelTextAreaInclusionBehaviour );
2914 
2915  foreach (Okular::TextEntity *te, words)
2916  {
2917  if (te->text().isEmpty()) {
2918  delete te;
2919  continue;
2920  }
2921 
2922  Okular::NormalizedRect wordArea = *te->area();
2923 
2924  // convert it from item coordinates to part coordinates
2925  wordArea.left -= tsp.rectInItem.left;
2926  wordArea.left /= (tsp.rectInItem.right - tsp.rectInItem.left);
2927  wordArea.right -= tsp.rectInItem.left;
2928  wordArea.right /= (tsp.rectInItem.right - tsp.rectInItem.left);
2929  wordArea.top -= tsp.rectInItem.top;
2930  wordArea.top /= (tsp.rectInItem.bottom - tsp.rectInItem.top);
2931  wordArea.bottom -= tsp.rectInItem.top;
2932  wordArea.bottom /= (tsp.rectInItem.bottom - tsp.rectInItem.top);
2933 
2934  // convert from part coordinates to table coordinates
2935  wordArea.left *= (tsp.rectInSelection.right - tsp.rectInSelection.left);
2936  wordArea.left += tsp.rectInSelection.left;
2937  wordArea.right *= (tsp.rectInSelection.right - tsp.rectInSelection.left);
2938  wordArea.right += tsp.rectInSelection.left;
2939  wordArea.top *= (tsp.rectInSelection.bottom - tsp.rectInSelection.top);
2940  wordArea.top += tsp.rectInSelection.top;
2941  wordArea.bottom *= (tsp.rectInSelection.bottom - tsp.rectInSelection.top);
2942  wordArea.bottom += tsp.rectInSelection.top;
2943 
2944  // add to the ticks arrays...
2945  colTicks.append( qMakePair( wordArea.left, +1) );
2946  colTicks.append( qMakePair( wordArea.right, -1) );
2947  rowTicks.append( qMakePair( wordArea.top, +1) );
2948  rowTicks.append( qMakePair( wordArea.bottom, -1) );
2949 
2950  delete te;
2951  }
2952  }
2953 
2954  int tally = 0;
2955 
2956  qSort( colSelectionTicks );
2957  qSort( rowSelectionTicks );
2958 
2959  for (int i = 0; i < colSelectionTicks.length(); ++i)
2960  {
2961  tally += colSelectionTicks[i].second;
2962  if ( tally == 0 && i + 1 < colSelectionTicks.length() && colSelectionTicks[i+1].first != colSelectionTicks[i].first)
2963  {
2964  colTicks.append( qMakePair( colSelectionTicks[i].first, +1 ) );
2965  colTicks.append( qMakePair( colSelectionTicks[i+1].first, -1 ) );
2966  }
2967  }
2968  Q_ASSERT( tally == 0 );
2969 
2970  for (int i = 0; i < rowSelectionTicks.length(); ++i)
2971  {
2972  tally += rowSelectionTicks[i].second;
2973  if ( tally == 0 && i + 1 < rowSelectionTicks.length() && rowSelectionTicks[i+1].first != rowSelectionTicks[i].first) {
2974  rowTicks.append( qMakePair( rowSelectionTicks[i].first, +1 ) );
2975  rowTicks.append( qMakePair( rowSelectionTicks[i+1].first, -1 ) );
2976  }
2977  }
2978  Q_ASSERT( tally == 0 );
2979 
2980  qSort( colTicks );
2981  qSort( rowTicks );
2982 
2983  for (int i = 0; i < colTicks.length(); ++i)
2984  {
2985  tally += colTicks[i].second;
2986  if ( tally == 0 && i + 1 < colTicks.length() && colTicks[i+1].first != colTicks[i].first)
2987  {
2988  d->tableSelectionCols.append( (colTicks[i].first+colTicks[i+1].first) / 2 );
2989  d->tableDividersGuessed = true;
2990  }
2991  }
2992  Q_ASSERT( tally == 0 );
2993 
2994  for (int i = 0; i < rowTicks.length(); ++i)
2995  {
2996  tally += rowTicks[i].second;
2997  if ( tally == 0 && i + 1 < rowTicks.length() && rowTicks[i+1].first != rowTicks[i].first)
2998  {
2999  d->tableSelectionRows.append( (rowTicks[i].first+rowTicks[i+1].first) / 2 );
3000  d->tableDividersGuessed = true;
3001  }
3002  }
3003  Q_ASSERT( tally == 0 );
3004 }

3054 void PageView::wheelEvent( QWheelEvent *e )
3055 {
3056  // don't perform any mouse action when viewport is autoscrolling
3057  if ( d->viewportMoveActive )
3058  return;
3059 
3060  if ( !d->document->isOpened() )
3061  {
3062  QAbstractScrollArea::wheelEvent( e );
3063  return;
3064  }
3065 
3066  int delta = e->delta(),
3067  vScroll = verticalScrollBar()->value();
3068  e->accept();
3069  if ( (e->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier) == Qt::ControlModifier ) {
3070  if ( e->delta() < 0 )
3071  slotZoomOut();
3072  else
3073  slotZoomIn();
3074  }
3075  else if ( delta <= -120 && !Okular::Settings::viewContinuous() && vScroll == verticalScrollBar()->maximum() )
3076  {
3077  // go to next page
3078  if ( (int)d->document->currentPage() < d->items.count() - 1 )
3079  {
3080  // more optimized than document->setNextPage and then move view to top
3081  Okular::DocumentViewport newViewport = d->document->viewport();
3082  newViewport.pageNumber += viewColumns();
3083  if ( newViewport.pageNumber >= (int)d->items.count() )
3084  newViewport.pageNumber = d->items.count() - 1;
3085  newViewport.rePos.enabled = true;
3086  newViewport.rePos.normalizedY = 0.0;
3087  d->document->setViewport( newViewport );
3088  }
3089  }
3090  else if ( delta >= 120 && !Okular::Settings::viewContinuous() && vScroll == verticalScrollBar()->minimum() )
3091  {
3092  // go to prev page
3093  if ( d->document->currentPage() > 0 )
3094  {
3095  // more optimized than document->setPrevPage and then move view to bottom
3096  Okular::DocumentViewport newViewport = d->document->viewport();
3097  newViewport.pageNumber -= viewColumns();
3098  if ( newViewport.pageNumber < 0 )
3099  newViewport.pageNumber = 0;
3100  newViewport.rePos.enabled = true;
3101  newViewport.rePos.normalizedY = 1.0;
3102  d->document->setViewport( newViewport );
3103  }
3104  }
3105  else
3106  QAbstractScrollArea::wheelEvent( e );
3107 
3108  updateCursor();
3109 }

3181 void PageView::scrollContentsBy( int dx, int dy )
3182 {
3183  const QRect r = viewport()->rect();
3184  viewport()->scroll( dx, dy, r );
3185  // HACK manually repaint the damaged regions, as it seems some updates are missed
3186  // thus leaving artifacts around
3187  QRegion rgn( r );
3188  rgn -= rgn & r.translated( dx, dy );
3189  foreach ( const QRect &rect, rgn.rects() )
3190  viewport()->repaint( rect );

3194 QList< Okular::RegularAreaRect * > PageView::textSelections( const QPoint& start, const QPoint& end, int& firstpage )
3195 {
3196  firstpage = -1;
3197  QList< Okular::RegularAreaRect * > ret;
3198  QSet< int > affectedItemsSet;
3199  QRect selectionRect = QRect( start, end ).normalized();
3200  foreach( PageViewItem * item, d->items )
3201  {
3202  if ( item->isVisible() && selectionRect.intersects( item->croppedGeometry() ) )
3203  affectedItemsSet.insert( item->pageNumber() );
3204  }
3205 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
3206  kDebug() << ">>>> item selected by mouse:" << affectedItemsSet.count();
3207 #endif
3208 
3209  if ( !affectedItemsSet.isEmpty() )
3210  {
3211  // is the mouse drag line the ne-sw diagonal of the selection rect?
3212  bool direction_ne_sw = start == selectionRect.topRight() || start == selectionRect.bottomLeft();
3213 
3214  int tmpmin = d->document->pages();
3215  int tmpmax = 0;
3216  foreach( int p, affectedItemsSet )
3217  {
3218  if ( p < tmpmin ) tmpmin = p;
3219  if ( p > tmpmax ) tmpmax = p;
3220  }
3221 
3222  PageViewItem * a = pickItemOnPoint( (int)( direction_ne_sw ? selectionRect.right() : selectionRect.left() ), (int)selectionRect.top() );
3223  int min = a && ( a->pageNumber() != tmpmax ) ? a->pageNumber() : tmpmin;
3224  PageViewItem * b = pickItemOnPoint( (int)( direction_ne_sw ? selectionRect.left() : selectionRect.right() ), (int)selectionRect.bottom() );
3225  int max = b && ( b->pageNumber() != tmpmin ) ? b->pageNumber() : tmpmax;
3226 
3227  QList< int > affectedItemsIds;
3228  for ( int i = min; i <= max; ++i )
3229  affectedItemsIds.append( i );
3230 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
3231  kDebug() << ">>>> pages:" << affectedItemsIds;
3232 #endif
3233  firstpage = affectedItemsIds.first();
3234 
3235  if ( affectedItemsIds.count() == 1 )
3236  {
3237  PageViewItem * item = d->items[ affectedItemsIds.first() ];
3238  selectionRect.translate( -item->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft() );
3239  ret.append( textSelectionForItem( item,
3240  direction_ne_sw ? selectionRect.topRight() : selectionRect.topLeft(),
3241  direction_ne_sw ? selectionRect.bottomLeft() : selectionRect.bottomRight() ) );
3242  }
3243  else if ( affectedItemsIds.count() > 1 )
3244  {
3245  // first item
3246  PageViewItem * first = d->items[ affectedItemsIds.first() ];
3247  QRect geom = first->croppedGeometry().intersect( selectionRect ).translated( -first->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft() );
3248  ret.append( textSelectionForItem( first,
3249  selectionRect.bottom() > geom.height() ? ( direction_ne_sw ? geom.topRight() : geom.topLeft() ) : ( direction_ne_sw ? geom.bottomRight() : geom.bottomLeft() ),
3250  QPoint() ) );
3251  // last item
3252  PageViewItem * last = d->items[ affectedItemsIds.last() ];
3253  geom = last->croppedGeometry().intersect( selectionRect ).translated( -last->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft() );
3254  // the last item needs to appended at last...
3255  Okular::RegularAreaRect * lastArea = textSelectionForItem( last,
3256  QPoint(),
3257  selectionRect.bottom() > geom.height() ? ( direction_ne_sw ? geom.bottomLeft() : geom.bottomRight() ) : ( direction_ne_sw ? geom.topLeft() : geom.topRight() ) );
3258  affectedItemsIds.removeFirst();
3259  affectedItemsIds.removeLast();
3260  // item between the two above
3261  foreach( int page, affectedItemsIds )
3262  {
3263  ret.append( textSelectionForItem( d->items[ page ] ) );
3264  }
3265  ret.append( lastArea );
3266  }
3267  }
3268  return ret;
3269 }

3272 void PageView::drawDocumentOnPainter( const QRect & contentsRect, QPainter * p )
3273 {
3274  QColor backColor = viewport()->palette().color( QPalette::Dark );
3275 
3276  // when checking if an Item is contained in contentsRect, instead of
3277  // growing PageViewItems rects (for keeping outline into account), we
3278  // grow the contentsRect
3279  QRect checkRect = contentsRect;
3280  checkRect.adjust( -3, -3, 1, 1 );
3281 
3282  // create a region from which we'll subtract painted rects
3283  QRegion remainingArea( contentsRect );
3284 
3285  // iterate over all items painting the ones intersecting contentsRect
3286  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator iIt = d->items.constBegin(), iEnd = d->items.constEnd();
3287  for ( ; iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
3288  {
3289  // check if a piece of the page intersects the contents rect
3290  if ( !(*iIt)->isVisible() || !(*iIt)->croppedGeometry().intersects( checkRect ) )
3291  continue;
3292 
3293  // get item and item's outline geometries
3294  PageViewItem * item = *iIt;
3295  QRect itemGeometry = item->croppedGeometry(),
3296  outlineGeometry = itemGeometry;
3297  outlineGeometry.adjust( -1, -1, 3, 3 );
3298 
3299  // move the painter to the top-left corner of the real page
3300  p->save();
3301  p->translate( itemGeometry.left(), itemGeometry.top() );
3302 
3303  // draw the page outline (black border and 2px bottom-right shadow)
3304  if ( !itemGeometry.contains( contentsRect ) )
3305  {
3306  int itemWidth = itemGeometry.width(),
3307  itemHeight = itemGeometry.height();
3308  // draw simple outline
3309  p->setPen( Qt::black );
3310  p->drawRect( -1, -1, itemWidth + 1, itemHeight + 1 );
3311  // draw bottom/right gradient
3312  static int levels = 2;
3313  int r = backColor.red() / (levels + 2) + 6,
3314  g = backColor.green() / (levels + 2) + 6,
3315  b = backColor.blue() / (levels + 2) + 6;
3316  for ( int i = 0; i < levels; i++ )
3317  {
3318  p->setPen( QColor( r * (i+2), g * (i+2), b * (i+2) ) );
3319  p->drawLine( i, i + itemHeight + 1, i + itemWidth + 1, i + itemHeight + 1 );
3320  p->drawLine( i + itemWidth + 1, i, i + itemWidth + 1, i + itemHeight );
3321  p->setPen( backColor );
3322  p->drawLine( -1, i + itemHeight + 1, i - 1, i + itemHeight + 1 );
3323  p->drawLine( i + itemWidth + 1, -1, i + itemWidth + 1, i - 1 );
3324  }
3325  }
3326 
3327  // draw the page using the PagePainter with all flags active
3328  if ( contentsRect.intersects( itemGeometry ) )
3329  {
3330  Okular::NormalizedPoint *viewPortPoint = 0;
3331  Okular::NormalizedPoint point( d->lastSourceLocationViewportNormalizedX, d->lastSourceLocationViewportNormalizedY );
3332  if( Okular::Settings::showSourceLocationsGraphically()
3333  && item->pageNumber() == d->lastSourceLocationViewportPageNumber )
3334  {
3335  viewPortPoint = &point;
3336  }
3337  QRect pixmapRect = contentsRect.intersect( itemGeometry );
3338  pixmapRect.translate( -item->croppedGeometry().topLeft() );
3339  PagePainter::paintCroppedPageOnPainter( p, item->page(), this, pageflags,
3340  item->uncroppedWidth(), item->uncroppedHeight(), pixmapRect,
3341  item->crop(), viewPortPoint );
3342  }
3343 
3344  // remove painted area from 'remainingArea' and restore painter
3345  remainingArea -= outlineGeometry.intersect( contentsRect );
3346  p->restore();
3347  }
3348 
3349  // fill with background color the unpainted area
3350  const QVector<QRect> &backRects = remainingArea.rects();
3351  int backRectsNumber = backRects.count();
3352  for ( int jr = 0; jr < backRectsNumber; jr++ )
3353  p->fillRect( backRects[ jr ], backColor );
3354 }
3355 
3356 void PageView::updateItemSize( PageViewItem * item, int colWidth, int rowHeight )
3357 {
3358  const Okular::Page * okularPage = item->page();
3359  double width = okularPage->width(),
3360  height = okularPage->height(),
3361  zoom = d->zoomFactor;
3362  Okular::NormalizedRect crop( 0., 0., 1., 1. );
3363 
3364  // Handle cropping
3365  if ( Okular::Settings::trimMargins() && okularPage->isBoundingBoxKnown()
3366  && !okularPage->boundingBox().isNull() )
3367  {
3368  crop = okularPage->boundingBox();
3369 
3370  // Rotate the bounding box
3371  for ( int i = okularPage->rotation(); i > 0; --i )
3372  {
3373  Okular::NormalizedRect rot = crop;
3374  crop.left = 1 - rot.bottom;
3375  crop.top = rot.left;
3376  crop.right = 1 - rot.top;
3377  crop.bottom = rot.right;
3378  }
3379 
3380  // Expand the crop slightly beyond the bounding box
3381  static const double cropExpandRatio = 0.04;
3382  const double cropExpand = cropExpandRatio * ( (crop.right-crop.left) + (crop.bottom-crop.top) ) / 2;
3383  crop = Okular::NormalizedRect(
3384  crop.left - cropExpand,
3385  crop.top - cropExpand,
3386  crop.right + cropExpand,
3387  crop.bottom + cropExpand ) & Okular::NormalizedRect( 0, 0, 1, 1 );
3388 
3389  // We currently generate a larger image and then crop it, so if the
3390  // crop rect is very small the generated image is huge. Hence, we shouldn't
3391  // let the crop rect become too small.
3392  // Make sure we crop by at most 50% in either dimension:
3393  static const double minCropRatio = 0.5;
3394  if ( ( crop.right - crop.left ) < minCropRatio )
3395  {
3396  const double newLeft = ( crop.left + crop.right ) / 2 - minCropRatio/2;
3397  crop.left = qMax( 0.0, qMin( 1.0 - minCropRatio, newLeft ) );
3398  crop.right = crop.left + minCropRatio;
3399  }
3400  if ( ( crop.bottom - crop.top ) < minCropRatio )
3401  {
3402  const double newTop = ( crop.top + crop.bottom ) / 2 - minCropRatio/2;
3403  crop.top = qMax( 0.0, qMin( 1.0 - minCropRatio, newTop ) );
3404  crop.bottom = crop.top + minCropRatio;
3405  }
3406 
3407  width *= ( crop.right - crop.left );
3408  height *= ( crop.bottom - crop.top );
3409 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
3410  kDebug() << "Cropped page" << okularPage->number() << "to" << crop
3411  << "width" << width << "height" << height << "by bbox" << okularPage->boundingBox();
3412 #endif
3413  }
3414 
3415  if ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFixed )
3416  {
3417  width *= zoom;
3418  height *= zoom;
3419  item->setWHZC( (int)width, (int)height, d->zoomFactor, crop );
3420  }
3421  else if ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFitWidth )
3422  {
3423  height = ( height / width ) * colWidth;
3424  zoom = (double)colWidth / width;
3425  item->setWHZC( colWidth, (int)height, zoom, crop );
3426  d->zoomFactor = zoom;
3427  }
3428  else if ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFitPage )
3429  {
3430  const double scaleW = (double)colWidth / (double)width;
3431  const double scaleH = (double)rowHeight / (double)height;
3432  zoom = qMin( scaleW, scaleH );
3433  item->setWHZC( (int)(zoom * width), (int)(zoom * height), zoom, crop );
3434  d->zoomFactor = zoom;
3435  }
3436  else if ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFitAuto )
3437  {
3438  const double aspectRatioRelation = 1.25; // relation between aspect ratios for "auto fit"
3439  const double uiAspect = (double)rowHeight / (double)colWidth;
3440  const double pageAspect = (double)height / (double)width;
3441  const double rel = uiAspect / pageAspect;
3442 
3443  const bool isContinuous = Okular::Settings::viewContinuous();
3444  if ( !isContinuous && rel > aspectRatioRelation )
3445  {
3446  // UI space is relatively much higher than the page
3447  zoom = (double)rowHeight / (double)height;
3448  }
3449  else if ( rel < 1.0 / aspectRatioRelation )
3450  {
3451  // UI space is relatively much wider than the page in relation
3452  zoom = (double)colWidth / (double)width;
3453  }
3454  else
3455  {
3456  // aspect ratios of page and UI space are very similar
3457  const double scaleW = (double)colWidth / (double)width;
3458  const double scaleH = (double)rowHeight / (double)height;
3459  zoom = qMin( scaleW, scaleH );
3460  }
3461  item->setWHZC( (int)(zoom * width), (int)(zoom * height), zoom, crop );
3462  d->zoomFactor = zoom;
3463  }
3464 #ifndef NDEBUG
3465  else
3466  kDebug() << "calling updateItemSize with unrecognized d->zoomMode!";
3467 #endif
3468 }
3469 
3470 PageViewItem * PageView::pickItemOnPoint( int x, int y )
3471 {
3472  PageViewItem * item = 0;
3473  QLinkedList< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator iIt = d->visibleItems.constBegin(), iEnd = d->visibleItems.constEnd();
3474  for ( ; iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
3475  {
3476  PageViewItem * i = *iIt;
3477  const QRect & r = i->croppedGeometry();
3478  if ( x < r.right() && x > r.left() && y < r.bottom() )
3479  {
3480  if ( y > r.top() )
3481  item = i;
3482  break;
3483  }
3484  }
3485  return item;
3486 }

3514 void PageView::scrollPosIntoView( const QPoint & pos )
3515 {
3516  if (pos.x() < horizontalScrollBar()->value()) d->dragScrollVector.setX(pos.x() - horizontalScrollBar()->value());
3517  else if (horizontalScrollBar()->value() + viewport()->width() < pos.x()) d->dragScrollVector.setX(pos.x() - horizontalScrollBar()->value() - viewport()->width());
3518  else d->dragScrollVector.setX(0);
3519 
3520  if (pos.y() < verticalScrollBar()->value()) d->dragScrollVector.setY(pos.y() - verticalScrollBar()->value());
3521  else if (verticalScrollBar()->value() + viewport()->height() < pos.y()) d->dragScrollVector.setY(pos.y() - verticalScrollBar()->value() - viewport()->height());
3522  else d->dragScrollVector.setY(0);
3523 
3524  if (d->dragScrollVector != QPoint(0, 0))
3525  {
3526  if (!d->dragScrollTimer.isActive()) d->dragScrollTimer.start(100);
3527  }
3528  else d->dragScrollTimer.stop();
3529 }

3531 void PageView::updateSelection( const QPoint & pos )
3532 {
3533  if ( d->mouseSelecting )
3534  {
3535  scrollPosIntoView( pos );
3536  // update the selection rect
3537  QRect updateRect = d->mouseSelectionRect;
3538  d->mouseSelectionRect.setBottomLeft( pos );
3539  updateRect |= d->mouseSelectionRect;
3540  updateRect.translate( -contentAreaPosition() );
3541  viewport()->update( updateRect.adjusted( -1, -1, 1, 1 ) );
3542  }
3543  else if ( d->mouseTextSelecting)
3544  {
3545  scrollPosIntoView( pos );
3546  int first = -1;
3547  const QList< Okular::RegularAreaRect * > selections = textSelections( pos, d->mouseSelectPos, first );
3548  QSet< int > pagesWithSelectionSet;
3549  for ( int i = 0; i < selections.count(); ++i )
3550  pagesWithSelectionSet.insert( i + first );
3551 
3552  const QSet< int > noMoreSelectedPages = d->pagesWithTextSelection - pagesWithSelectionSet;
3553  // clear the selection from pages not selected anymore
3554  foreach( int p, noMoreSelectedPages )
3555  {
3556  d->document->setPageTextSelection( p, 0, QColor() );
3557  }
3558  // set the new selection for the selected pages
3559  foreach( int p, pagesWithSelectionSet )
3560  {
3561  d->document->setPageTextSelection( p, selections[ p - first ], palette().color( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight ) );
3562  }
3563  d->pagesWithTextSelection = pagesWithSelectionSet;
3564  }
3565 }
3566 
3567 static Okular::NormalizedPoint rotateInNormRect( const QPoint &rotated, const QRect &rect, Okular::Rotation rotation )
3568 {
3569  Okular::NormalizedPoint ret;
3570 
3571  switch ( rotation )
3572  {
3573  case Okular::Rotation0:
3574  ret = Okular::NormalizedPoint( rotated.x(), rotated.y(), rect.width(), rect.height() );
3575  break;
3576  case Okular::Rotation90:
3577  ret = Okular::NormalizedPoint( rotated.y(), rect.width() - rotated.x(), rect.height(), rect.width() );
3578  break;
3579  case Okular::Rotation180:
3580  ret = Okular::NormalizedPoint( rect.width() - rotated.x(), rect.height() - rotated.y(), rect.width(), rect.height() );
3581  break;
3582  case Okular::Rotation270:
3583  ret = Okular::NormalizedPoint( rect.height() - rotated.y(), rotated.x(), rect.height(), rect.width() );
3584  break;
3585  }
3586 
3587  return ret;
3588 }
3589 
3590 Okular::RegularAreaRect * PageView::textSelectionForItem( PageViewItem * item, const QPoint & startPoint, const QPoint & endPoint )
3591 {
3592  const QRect & geometry = item->uncroppedGeometry();
3593  Okular::NormalizedPoint startCursor( 0.0, 0.0 );
3594  if ( !startPoint.isNull() )
3595  {
3596  startCursor = rotateInNormRect( startPoint, geometry, item->page()->rotation() );
3597  }
3598  Okular::NormalizedPoint endCursor( 1.0, 1.0 );
3599  if ( !endPoint.isNull() )
3600  {
3601  endCursor = rotateInNormRect( endPoint, geometry, item->page()->rotation() );
3602  }
3603  Okular::TextSelection mouseTextSelectionInfo( startCursor, endCursor );
3604 
3605  const Okular::Page * okularPage = item->page();
3606 
3607  if ( !okularPage->hasTextPage() )
3608  d->document->requestTextPage( okularPage->number() );
3609 
3610  Okular::RegularAreaRect * selectionArea = okularPage->textArea( &mouseTextSelectionInfo );
3611 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
3612  kDebug().nospace() << "text areas (" << okularPage->number() << "): " << ( selectionArea ? QString::number( selectionArea->count() ) : "(none)" );
3613 #endif
3614  return selectionArea;
3615 }

3639 void PageView::updateZoom( ZoomMode newZoomMode )
3640 {
3641  if ( newZoomMode == ZoomFixed )
3642  {
3643  if ( d->aZoom->currentItem() == 0 )
3644  newZoomMode = ZoomFitWidth;
3645  else if ( d->aZoom->currentItem() == 1 )
3646  newZoomMode = ZoomFitPage;
3647  else if ( d->aZoom->currentItem() == 2 )
3648  newZoomMode = ZoomFitAuto;
3649  }
3650 
3651  float newFactor = d->zoomFactor;
3652  QAction * checkedZoomAction = 0;
3653  switch ( newZoomMode )
3654  {
3655  case ZoomFixed:{ //ZoomFixed case
3656  QString z = d->aZoom->currentText();
3657  // kdelibs4 sometimes adds accelerators to actions' text directly :(
3658  z.remove ('&');
3659  z.remove ('%');
3660  newFactor = KGlobal::locale()->readNumber( z ) / 100.0;
3661  }break;
3662  case ZoomIn:
3663  newFactor += (newFactor > 0.99) ? ( newFactor > 1.99 ? 0.5 : 0.2 ) : 0.1;
3664  newZoomMode = ZoomFixed;
3665  break;
3666  case ZoomOut:
3667  newFactor -= (newFactor > 1.01) ? ( newFactor > 2.01 ? 0.5 : 0.2 ) : 0.1;
3668  newZoomMode = ZoomFixed;
3669  break;
3670  case ZoomFitWidth:
3671  checkedZoomAction = d->aZoomFitWidth;
3672  break;
3673  case ZoomFitPage:
3674  checkedZoomAction = d->aZoomFitPage;
3675  break;
3676  case ZoomFitAuto:
3677  checkedZoomAction = d->aZoomAutoFit;
3678  break;
3679  case ZoomRefreshCurrent:
3680  newZoomMode = ZoomFixed;
3681  d->zoomFactor = -1;
3682  break;
3683  }
3684  const float upperZoomLimit = d->document->supportsTiles() ? 16.0 : 4.0;
3685  if ( newFactor > upperZoomLimit )
3686  newFactor = upperZoomLimit;
3687  if ( newFactor < 0.1 )
3688  newFactor = 0.1;
3689 
3690  if ( newZoomMode != d->zoomMode || (newZoomMode == ZoomFixed && newFactor != d->zoomFactor ) )
3691  {
3692  // rebuild layout and update the whole viewport
3693  d->zoomMode = newZoomMode;
3694  d->zoomFactor = newFactor;
3695  // be sure to block updates to document's viewport
3696  bool prevState = d->blockViewport;
3697  d->blockViewport = true;
3698  slotRelayoutPages();
3699  d->blockViewport = prevState;
3700  // request pixmaps
3701  slotRequestVisiblePixmaps();
3702  // update zoom text
3703  updateZoomText();
3704  // update actions checked state
3705  if ( d->aZoomFitWidth )
3706  {
3707  d->aZoomFitWidth->setChecked( checkedZoomAction == d->aZoomFitWidth );
3708  d->aZoomFitPage->setChecked( checkedZoomAction == d->aZoomFitPage );
3709  d->aZoomAutoFit->setChecked( checkedZoomAction == d->aZoomAutoFit );
3710  }
3711  }
3712  else if ( newZoomMode == ZoomFixed && newFactor == d->zoomFactor )
3713  updateZoomText();
3714 
3715  d->aZoomIn->setEnabled( d->zoomFactor < upperZoomLimit-0.001 );
3716  d->aZoomOut->setEnabled( d->zoomFactor > 0.101 );
3717 }
3718 
3719 void PageView::updateZoomText()
3720 {
3721  // use current page zoom as zoomFactor if in ZoomFit/* mode
3722  if ( d->zoomMode != ZoomFixed && d->items.count() > 0 )
3723  d->zoomFactor = d->items[ qMax( 0, (int)d->document->currentPage() ) ]->zoomFactor();
3724  float newFactor = d->zoomFactor;
3725  d->aZoom->removeAllActions();
3726 
3727  // add items that describe fit actions
3728  QStringList translated;
3729  translated << i18n("Fit Width") << i18n("Fit Page") << i18n("Auto Fit");
3730 
3731  // add percent items
3732  QString double_oh( "00" );
3733  const float zoomValue[13] = { 0.12, 0.25, 0.33, 0.50, 0.66, 0.75, 1.00, 1.25, 1.50, 2.00, 4.00, 8.00, 16.00 };
3734  int idx = 0, selIdx = 3;
3735  bool inserted = false; //use: "d->zoomMode != ZoomFixed" to hide Fit/* zoom ratio
3736  int zoomValueCount = 11;
3737  if ( d->document->supportsTiles() )
3738  zoomValueCount = 13;
3739  while ( idx < zoomValueCount || !inserted )
3740  {
3741  float value = idx < zoomValueCount ? zoomValue[ idx ] : newFactor;
3742  if ( !inserted && newFactor < (value - 0.0001) )
3743  value = newFactor;
3744  else
3745  idx ++;
3746  if ( value > (newFactor - 0.0001) && value < (newFactor + 0.0001) )
3747  inserted = true;
3748  if ( !inserted )
3749  selIdx++;
3750  QString localValue( KGlobal::locale()->formatNumber( value * 100.0, 2 ) );
3751  localValue.remove( KGlobal::locale()->decimalSymbol() + double_oh );
3752  // remove a trailing zero in numbers like 66.70
3753  if ( localValue.right( 1 ) == QLatin1String( "0" ) && localValue.indexOf( KGlobal::locale()->decimalSymbol() ) > -1 )
3754  localValue.chop( 1 );
3755  translated << QString( "%1%" ).arg( localValue );
3756  }
3757  d->aZoom->setItems( translated );
3758 
3759  // select current item in list
3760  if ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFitWidth )
3761  selIdx = 0;
3762  else if ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFitPage )
3763  selIdx = 1;
3764  else if ( d->zoomMode == ZoomFitAuto )
3765  selIdx = 2;
3766  // we have to temporarily enable the actions as otherwise we can't set a new current item
3767  d->aZoom->setEnabled( true );
3768  d->aZoom->selectableActionGroup()->setEnabled( true );
3769  d->aZoom->setCurrentItem( selIdx );
3770  d->aZoom->setEnabled( d->items.size() > 0 );
3771  d->aZoom->selectableActionGroup()->setEnabled( d->items.size() > 0 );
3772 }

3780 void PageView::updateCursor( const QPoint &p )
3781 {
3782  // detect the underlaying page (if present)
3783  PageViewItem * pageItem = pickItemOnPoint( p.x(), p.y() );
3784 
3785  if ( d->annotator && d->annotator->active() )
3786  {
3787  if ( pageItem || d->annotator->annotating() )
3788  setCursor( d->annotator->cursor() );
3789  else
3790  setCursor( Qt::ForbiddenCursor );
3791  }
3792  else if ( pageItem )
3793  {
3794  double nX = pageItem->absToPageX(p.x());
3795  double nY = pageItem->absToPageY(p.y());
3796 
3797  // if over a ObjectRect (of type Link) change cursor to hand
3798  if ( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::TextSelect )
3799  setCursor( Qt::IBeamCursor );
3800  else if ( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Magnifier )
3801  setCursor( Qt::CrossCursor );
3802  else if ( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::RectSelect )
3803  setCursor( Qt::CrossCursor );
3804  else if ( d->mouseAnn )
3805  setCursor( Qt::ClosedHandCursor );
3806  else if ( Okular::Settings::mouseMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Browse )
3807  {
3808  const Okular::ObjectRect * linkobj = pageItem->page()->objectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::Action, nX, nY, pageItem->uncroppedWidth(), pageItem->uncroppedHeight() );
3809  const Okular::ObjectRect * annotobj = pageItem->page()->objectRect( Okular::ObjectRect::OAnnotation, nX, nY, pageItem->uncroppedWidth(), pageItem->uncroppedHeight() );
3810  if ( linkobj && !annotobj )
3811  {
3812  d->mouseOnRect = true;
3813  setCursor( Qt::PointingHandCursor );
3814  }
3815  else
3816  {
3817  d->mouseOnRect = false;
3818  if ( annotobj )
3819  {
3820  const Okular::Annotation *annotation = static_cast< const Okular::AnnotationObjectRect * >( annotobj )->annotation();
3821  if ( ( QApplication::keyboardModifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier )
3822  && annotation->canBeMoved() )
3823  {
3824  setCursor( Qt::OpenHandCursor );
3825  }
3826  else if ( annotation->subType() == Okular::Annotation::AMovie )
3827  {
3828  d->mouseOnRect = true;
3829  setCursor( Qt::PointingHandCursor );
3830  }
3831  else if ( annotation->subType() == Okular::Annotation::AScreen )
3832  {
3833  if ( GuiUtils::renditionMovieFromScreenAnnotation( static_cast< const Okular::ScreenAnnotation * >( annotation ) ) != 0 )
3834  {
3835  d->mouseOnRect = true;
3836  setCursor( Qt::PointingHandCursor );
3837  }
3838  }
3839  else
3840  {
3841  setCursor( Qt::OpenHandCursor );
3842  }
3843  }
3844  else
3845  {
3846  setCursor( Qt::OpenHandCursor );
3847  }
3848  }
3849  }
3850  else
3851  {
3852  setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
3853  }
3854  }
3855  else
3856  {
3857  // if there's no page over the cursor and we were showing the pointingHandCursor
3858  // go back to the normal one
3859  d->mouseOnRect = false;
3860  setCursor( Qt::ArrowCursor );
3861  }
3862 }

3864 void PageView::moveMagnifier( const QPoint& p ) // non scaled point
3865 {
3866  const int w = d->magnifierView->width() * 0.5;
3867  const int h = d->magnifierView->height() * 0.5;
3868 
3869  int x = p.x() - w;
3870  int y = p.y() - h;
3871 
3872  const int max_x = viewport()->width();
3873  const int max_y = viewport()->height();
3874 
3875  QPoint scroll(0,0);
3876 
3877  if (x < 0)
3878  {
3879  if (horizontalScrollBar()->value() > 0) scroll.setX(x - w);
3880  x = 0;
3881  }
3882 
3883  if (y < 0)
3884  {
3885  if (verticalScrollBar()->value() > 0) scroll.setY(y - h);
3886  y = 0;
3887  }
3888 
3889  if (p.x() + w > max_x)
3890  {
3891  if (horizontalScrollBar()->value() < horizontalScrollBar()->maximum()) scroll.setX(p.x() + 2 * w - max_x);
3892  x = max_x - d->magnifierView->width() - 1;
3893  }
3894 
3895  if (p.y() + h > max_y)
3896  {
3897  if (verticalScrollBar()->value() < verticalScrollBar()->maximum()) scroll.setY(p.y() + 2 * h - max_y);
3898  y = max_y - d->magnifierView->height() - 1;
3899  }
3900 
3901  if (!scroll.isNull())
3902  scrollPosIntoView(contentAreaPoint(p + scroll));
3903 
3904  d->magnifierView->move(x, y);
3905 }

3914  d->magnifierView->updateView( np, item->page() );

4044 //BEGIN private SLOTS
4045 void PageView::slotRelayoutPages()
4046 // called by: notifySetup, viewportResizeEvent, slotViewMode, slotContinuousToggled, updateZoom
4047 {
4048  // set an empty container if we have no pages
4049  const int pageCount = d->items.count();
4050  if ( pageCount < 1 )
4051  {
4052  return;
4053  }
4054 
4055  // if viewport was auto-moving, stop it
4056  if ( d->viewportMoveActive )
4057  {
4058  center( d->viewportMoveDest.x(), d->viewportMoveDest.y() );
4059  d->viewportMoveActive = false;
4060  d->viewportMoveTimer->stop();
4061  verticalScrollBar()->setEnabled( true );
4062  horizontalScrollBar()->setEnabled( true );
4063  }
4064 
4065  // common iterator used in this method and viewport parameters
4066  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator iIt, iEnd = d->items.constEnd();
4067  int viewportWidth = viewport()->width(),
4068  viewportHeight = viewport()->height(),
4069  fullWidth = 0,
4070  fullHeight = 0;
4071  QRect viewportRect( horizontalScrollBar()->value(), verticalScrollBar()->value(), viewportWidth, viewportHeight );
4072 
4073  // handle the 'center first page in row' stuff
4074  const bool facing = Okular::Settings::viewMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumViewMode::Facing && pageCount > 1;
4075  const bool facingCentered = Okular::Settings::viewMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumViewMode::FacingFirstCentered ||
4076  (Okular::Settings::viewMode() == Okular::Settings::EnumViewMode::Facing && pageCount == 1);
4077  const bool overrideCentering = facingCentered && pageCount < 3;
4078  const bool centerFirstPage = facingCentered && !overrideCentering;
4079  const bool facingPages = facing || centerFirstPage;
4080  const bool centerLastPage = centerFirstPage && pageCount % 2 == 0;
4081  const bool continuousView = Okular::Settings::viewContinuous();
4082  const int nCols = overrideCentering ? 1 : viewColumns();
4083  //added by Ganesh P Kumar
4084  const bool rightToLeft = Okular::Settings::rightToLeft();
4085  //modification ends
4086 
4087  printf("rightToLeft = %d\n", rightToLeft);
4088  // set all items geometry and resize contents. handle 'continuous' and 'single' modes separately
4089 
4090  PageViewItem * currentItem = d->items[ qMax( 0, (int)d->document->currentPage() ) ];
4091 
4092  // Here we find out column's width and row's height to compute a table
4093  // so we can place widgets 'centered in virtual cells'.
4094  const int nRows = (int)ceil( (float)(centerFirstPage ? (pageCount + nCols - 1) : pageCount) / (float)nCols );
4095 
4096  int * colWidth = new int[ nCols ],
4097  * rowHeight = new int[ nRows ],
4098  cIdx = 0,
4099  rIdx = 0;
4100  for ( int i = 0; i < nCols; i++ )
4101  colWidth[ i ] = viewportWidth / nCols;
4102  for ( int i = 0; i < nRows; i++ )
4103  rowHeight[ i ] = 0;
4104  // handle the 'centering on first row' stuff
4105  if ( centerFirstPage )
4106  cIdx += nCols - 1;
4107 
4108  // 1) find the maximum columns width and rows height for a grid in
4109  // which each page must well-fit inside a cell
4110  for ( iIt = d->items.constBegin(); iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
4111  {
4112  PageViewItem * item = *iIt;
4113  // update internal page size (leaving a little margin in case of Fit* modes)
4114  updateItemSize( item, colWidth[ cIdx ] - 6, viewportHeight - 12 );
4115  // find row's maximum height and column's max width
4116  if ( item->croppedWidth() + 6 > colWidth[ cIdx ] )
4117  colWidth[ cIdx ] = item->croppedWidth() + 6;
4118  if ( item->croppedHeight() + 12 > rowHeight[ rIdx ] )
4119  rowHeight[ rIdx ] = item->croppedHeight() + 12;
4120  // handle the 'centering on first row' stuff
4121  // update col/row indices
4122  if ( ++cIdx == nCols )
4123  {
4124  cIdx = 0;
4125  rIdx++;
4126  }
4127  }
4128 
4129  const int pageRowIdx = ( ( centerFirstPage ? nCols - 1 : 0 ) + currentItem->pageNumber() ) / nCols;
4130 
4131  // 2) compute full size
4132  for ( int i = 0; i < nCols; i++ )
4133  fullWidth += colWidth[ i ];
4134  if ( continuousView )
4135  {
4136  for ( int i = 0; i < nRows; i++ )
4137  fullHeight += rowHeight[ i ];
4138  }
4139  else
4140  fullHeight = rowHeight[ pageRowIdx ];
4141 
4142  // 3) arrange widgets inside cells (and refine fullHeight if needed)
4143  int insertX = 0,
4144  insertY = fullHeight < viewportHeight ? ( viewportHeight - fullHeight ) / 2 : 0;
4145  const int origInsertY = insertY;
4146  cIdx = 0;
4147  rIdx = 0;
4148  if ( centerFirstPage )
4149  {
4150  cIdx += nCols - 1;
4151  for ( int i = 0; i < cIdx; ++i )
4152  insertX += colWidth[ i ];
4153  }
4154  for ( iIt = d->items.constBegin(); iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
4155  {
4156  PageViewItem * item = *iIt;
4157  int cWidth = colWidth[ cIdx ],
4158  rHeight = rowHeight[ rIdx ];
4159  if ( continuousView || rIdx == pageRowIdx )
4160  {
4161  const bool reallyDoCenterFirst = item->pageNumber() == 0 && centerFirstPage;
4162  const bool reallyDoCenterLast = item->pageNumber() == pageCount - 1 && centerLastPage;
4163  int actualX = 0;
4164  if ( reallyDoCenterFirst || reallyDoCenterLast )
4165  {
4166  // page is centered across entire viewport
4167  actualX = (fullWidth - item->croppedWidth()) / 2;
4168  }
4169  else if ( facingPages )
4170  {
4171  // Commented out by Ganesh P Kumar
4172  // page edges 'touch' the center of the viewport
4173  /*actualX = ( (centerFirstPage && item->pageNumber() % 2 == 1) ||
4174  (!centerFirstPage && item->pageNumber() % 2 == 0) ) ?
4175  (fullWidth / 2) - item->croppedWidth() - 1 : (fullWidth / 2) + 1;
4176  */
4177  //added by Ganesh P Kumar
4178  int trueVal = (fullWidth / 2)-item->croppedWidth()-1;
4179  int falseVal = (fullWidth / 2) + 1;
4180  if(centerFirstPage && item->pageNumber() % 2 == 1){
4181  if(!rightToLeft)
4182  actualX = trueVal;
4183  else
4184  actualX = falseVal;
4185  }
4186  else if(!centerFirstPage && item->pageNumber() % 2 == 0){
4187  if(!rightToLeft)
4188  actualX = trueVal;
4189  else
4190  actualX = falseVal;
4191  }
4192  else{
4193  if(!rightToLeft)
4194  actualX = falseVal;
4195  else
4196  actualX = trueVal;
4197  }
4198 
4199  }
4200  else
4201  {
4202  // page is centered within its virtual column
4203  actualX = insertX + (cWidth - item->croppedWidth()) / 2;
4204  }
4205  item->moveTo( actualX,
4206  (continuousView ? insertY : origInsertY) + (rHeight - item->croppedHeight()) / 2 );
4207  item->setVisible( true );
4208  }
4209  else
4210  {
4211  item->moveTo( 0, 0 );
4212  item->setVisible( false );
4213  }
4214  item->setFormWidgetsVisible( d->m_formsVisible );
4215  // advance col/row index
4216  insertX += cWidth;
4217  if ( ++cIdx == nCols )
4218  {
4219  cIdx = 0;
4220  rIdx++;
4221  insertX = 0;
4222  insertY += rHeight;
4223  }
4224 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
4225  kWarning() << "updating size for pageno" << item->pageNumber() << "cropped" << item->croppedGeometry() << "uncropped" << item->uncroppedGeometry();
4226 #endif
4227  }
4228 
4229  delete [] colWidth;
4230  delete [] rowHeight;
4231 
4232  // 3) reset dirty state
4233  d->dirtyLayout = false;
4234 
4235  // 4) update scrollview's contents size and recenter view
4236  bool wasUpdatesEnabled = viewport()->updatesEnabled();
4237  if ( fullWidth != contentAreaWidth() || fullHeight != contentAreaHeight() )
4238  {
4239  const Okular::DocumentViewport vp = d->document->viewport();
4240  // disable updates and resize the viewportContents
4241  if ( wasUpdatesEnabled )
4242  viewport()->setUpdatesEnabled( false );
4243  resizeContentArea( QSize( fullWidth, fullHeight ) );
4244  // restore previous viewport if defined and updates enabled
4245  if ( wasUpdatesEnabled )
4246  {
4247  if ( vp.pageNumber >= 0 )
4248  {
4249  int prevX = horizontalScrollBar()->value(),
4250  prevY = verticalScrollBar()->value();
4251  const QRect & geometry = d->items[ vp.pageNumber ]->croppedGeometry();
4252  double nX = vp.rePos.enabled ? normClamp( vp.rePos.normalizedX, 0.5 ) : 0.5,
4253  nY = vp.rePos.enabled ? normClamp( vp.rePos.normalizedY, 0.0 ) : 0.0;
4254  center( geometry.left() + qRound( nX * (double)geometry.width() ),
4255  geometry.top() + qRound( nY * (double)geometry.height() ) );
4256  // center() usually moves the viewport, that requests pixmaps too.
4257  // if that doesn't happen we have to request them by hand
4258  if ( prevX == horizontalScrollBar()->value() && prevY == verticalScrollBar()->value() )
4259  slotRequestVisiblePixmaps();
4260  }
4261  // or else go to center page
4262  else
4263  center( fullWidth / 2, 0 );
4264  viewport()->setUpdatesEnabled( true );
4265  }
4266  }
4267 
4268  // 5) update the whole viewport if updated enabled
4269  if ( wasUpdatesEnabled )
4270  viewport()->update();
4271 }

4273 void PageView::delayedResizeEvent()
4274 {
4275  // If we already got here we don't need to execute the timer slot again
4276  d->delayResizeEventTimer->stop();
4277  slotRelayoutPages();
4278  slotRequestVisiblePixmaps();
4279 }

4281 static void slotRequestPreloadPixmap( Okular::DocumentObserver * observer, const PageViewItem * i, const QRect &expandedViewportRect, QLinkedList< Okular::PixmapRequest * > *requestedPixmaps )
4282 {
4283  Okular::NormalizedRect preRenderRegion;
4284  const QRect intersectionRect = expandedViewportRect.intersect( i->croppedGeometry() );
4285  if ( !intersectionRect.isEmpty() )
4286  preRenderRegion = Okular::NormalizedRect( intersectionRect.translated( -i->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft() ), i->uncroppedWidth(), i->uncroppedHeight() );
4287 
4288  // request the pixmap if not already present
4289  if ( !i->page()->hasPixmap( observer, i->uncroppedWidth(), i->uncroppedHeight(), preRenderRegion ) && i->uncroppedWidth() > 0 )
4290  {
4291  Okular::PixmapRequest::PixmapRequestFeatures requestFeatures = Okular::PixmapRequest::Preload;
4292  requestFeatures |= Okular::PixmapRequest::Asynchronous;
4293  const bool pageHasTilesManager = i->page()->hasTilesManager( observer );
4294  if ( pageHasTilesManager && !preRenderRegion.isNull() )
4295  {
4296  Okular::PixmapRequest * p = new Okular::PixmapRequest( observer, i->pageNumber(), i->uncroppedWidth(), i->uncroppedHeight(), PAGEVIEW_PRELOAD_PRIO, requestFeatures );
4297  requestedPixmaps->push_back( p );
4298 
4299  p->setNormalizedRect( preRenderRegion );
4300  p->setTile( true );
4301  }
4302  else if ( !pageHasTilesManager )
4303  {
4304  Okular::PixmapRequest * p = new Okular::PixmapRequest( observer, i->pageNumber(), i->uncroppedWidth(), i->uncroppedHeight(), PAGEVIEW_PRELOAD_PRIO, requestFeatures );
4305  requestedPixmaps->push_back( p );
4306  p->setNormalizedRect( preRenderRegion );
4307  }
4308  }
4309 }
4310 
4311 void PageView::slotRequestVisiblePixmaps( int newValue )
4312 {
4313  // if requests are blocked (because raised by an unwanted event), exit
4314  if ( d->blockPixmapsRequest || d->viewportMoveActive ||
4315  ( QApplication::mouseButtons () & Qt::MidButton ) )
4316  return;
4317 
4318  // precalc view limits for intersecting with page coords inside the loop
4319  const bool isEvent = newValue != -1 && !d->blockViewport;
4320  const QRect viewportRect( horizontalScrollBar()->value(),
4321  verticalScrollBar()->value(),
4322  viewport()->width(), viewport()->height() );
4323  const QRect viewportRectAtZeroZero( 0, 0, viewport()->width(), viewport()->height() );
4324 
4325  // some variables used to determine the viewport
4326  int nearPageNumber = -1;
4327  const double viewportCenterX = (viewportRect.left() + viewportRect.right()) / 2.0;
4328  const double viewportCenterY = (viewportRect.top() + viewportRect.bottom()) / 2.0;
4329  double focusedX = 0.5,
4330  focusedY = 0.0,
4331  minDistance = -1.0;
4332  // Margin (in pixels) around the viewport to preload
4333  const int pixelsToExpand = 512;
4334 
4335  // iterate over all items
4336  d->visibleItems.clear();
4337  QLinkedList< Okular::PixmapRequest * > requestedPixmaps;
4338  QVector< Okular::VisiblePageRect * > visibleRects;
4339  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator iIt = d->items.constBegin(), iEnd = d->items.constEnd();
4340  for ( ; iIt != iEnd; ++iIt )
4341  {
4342  PageViewItem * i = *iIt;
4343  foreach( FormWidgetIface *fwi, i->formWidgets() )
4344  {
4345  Okular::NormalizedRect r = fwi->rect();
4346  fwi->moveTo(
4347  qRound( i->uncroppedGeometry().left() + i->uncroppedWidth() * r.left ) + 1 - viewportRect.left(),
4348  qRound( i->uncroppedGeometry().top() + i->uncroppedHeight() * r.top ) + 1 - viewportRect.top() );
4349  }
4350  Q_FOREACH ( VideoWidget *vw, i->videoWidgets() )
4351  {
4352  const Okular::NormalizedRect r = vw->normGeometry();
4353  vw->move(
4354  qRound( i->uncroppedGeometry().left() + i->uncroppedWidth() * r.left ) + 1 - viewportRect.left(),
4355  qRound( i->uncroppedGeometry().top() + i->uncroppedHeight() * r.top ) + 1 - viewportRect.top() );
4356 
4357  if ( vw->isPlaying() && viewportRectAtZeroZero.intersect( vw->geometry() ).isEmpty() ) {
4358  vw->stop();
4359  vw->pageLeft();
4360  }
4361  }
4362 
4363  if ( !i->isVisible() )
4364  continue;
4365 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
4366  kWarning() << "checking page" << i->pageNumber();
4367  kWarning().nospace() << "viewportRect is " << viewportRect << ", page item is " << i->croppedGeometry() << " intersect : " << viewportRect.intersects( i->croppedGeometry() );
4368 #endif
4369  // if the item doesn't intersect the viewport, skip it
4370  QRect intersectionRect = viewportRect.intersect( i->croppedGeometry() );
4371  if ( intersectionRect.isEmpty() )
4372  {
4373  continue;
4374  }
4375 
4376  // add the item to the 'visible list'
4377  d->visibleItems.push_back( i );
4378  Okular::VisiblePageRect * vItem = new Okular::VisiblePageRect( i->pageNumber(), Okular::NormalizedRect( intersectionRect.translated( -i->uncroppedGeometry().topLeft() ), i->uncroppedWidth(), i->uncroppedHeight() ) );
4379  visibleRects.push_back( vItem );
4380 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
4381  kWarning() << "checking for pixmap for page" << i->pageNumber() << "=" << i->page()->hasPixmap( this, i->uncroppedWidth(), i->uncroppedHeight() );
4382  kWarning() << "checking for text for page" << i->pageNumber() << "=" << i->page()->hasTextPage();
4383 #endif
4384 
4385  Okular::NormalizedRect expandedVisibleRect = vItem->rect;
4386  if ( i->page()->hasTilesManager( this ) && Okular::Settings::memoryLevel() != Okular::Settings::EnumMemoryLevel::Low )
4387  {
4388  double rectMargin = pixelsToExpand/(double)i->uncroppedHeight();
4389  expandedVisibleRect.left = qMax( 0.0, vItem->rect.left - rectMargin );
4390  expandedVisibleRect.top = qMax( 0.0, vItem->rect.top - rectMargin );
4391  expandedVisibleRect.right = qMin( 1.0, vItem->rect.right + rectMargin );
4392  expandedVisibleRect.bottom = qMin( 1.0, vItem->rect.bottom + rectMargin );
4393  }
4394 
4395  // if the item has not the right pixmap, add a request for it
4396  if ( !i->page()->hasPixmap( this, i->uncroppedWidth(), i->uncroppedHeight(), expandedVisibleRect ) )
4397  {
4398 #ifdef PAGEVIEW_DEBUG
4399  kWarning() << "rerequesting visible pixmaps for page" << i->pageNumber() << "!";
4400 #endif
4401  Okular::PixmapRequest * p = new Okular::PixmapRequest( this, i->pageNumber(), i->uncroppedWidth(), i->uncroppedHeight(), PAGEVIEW_PRIO, Okular::PixmapRequest::Asynchronous );
4402  requestedPixmaps.push_back( p );
4403 
4404  if ( i->page()->hasTilesManager( this ) )
4405  {
4406  p->setNormalizedRect( expandedVisibleRect );
4407  p->setTile( true );
4408  }
4409  else
4410  p->setNormalizedRect( vItem->rect );
4411  }
4412 
4413  // look for the item closest to viewport center and the relative
4414  // position between the item and the viewport center
4415  if ( isEvent )
4416  {
4417  const QRect & geometry = i->croppedGeometry();
4418  // compute distance between item center and viewport center (slightly moved left)
4419  double distance = hypot( (geometry.left() + geometry.right()) / 2 - (viewportCenterX - 4),
4420  (geometry.top() + geometry.bottom()) / 2 - viewportCenterY );
4421  if ( distance >= minDistance && nearPageNumber != -1 )
4422  continue;
4423  nearPageNumber = i->pageNumber();
4424  minDistance = distance;
4425  if ( geometry.height() > 0 && geometry.width() > 0 )
4426  {
4427  focusedX = ( viewportCenterX - (double)geometry.left() ) / (double)geometry.width();
4428  focusedY = ( viewportCenterY - (double)geometry.top() ) / (double)geometry.height();
4429  }
4430  }
4431  }
4432 
4433  // if preloading is enabled, add the pages before and after in preloading
4434  if ( !d->visibleItems.isEmpty() &&
4435  Okular::SettingsCore::memoryLevel() != Okular::SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Low )
4436  {
4437  // as the requests are done in the order as they appear in the list,
4438  // request first the next page and then the previous
4439 
4440  int pagesToPreload = viewColumns();
4441 
4442  // if the greedy option is set, preload all pages
4443  if (Okular::SettingsCore::memoryLevel() == Okular::SettingsCore::EnumMemoryLevel::Greedy)
4444  pagesToPreload = d->items.count();
4445 
4446  const QRect expandedViewportRect = viewportRect.adjusted( 0, -pixelsToExpand, 0, pixelsToExpand );
4447 
4448  for( int j = 1; j <= pagesToPreload; j++ )
4449  {
4450  // add the page after the 'visible series' in preload
4451  const int tailRequest = d->visibleItems.last()->pageNumber() + j;
4452  if ( tailRequest < (int)d->items.count() )
4453  {
4454  slotRequestPreloadPixmap( this, d->items[ tailRequest ], expandedViewportRect, &requestedPixmaps );
4455  }
4456 
4457  // add the page before the 'visible series' in preload
4458  const int headRequest = d->visibleItems.first()->pageNumber() - j;
4459  if ( headRequest >= 0 )
4460  {
4461  slotRequestPreloadPixmap( this, d->items[ headRequest ], expandedViewportRect, &requestedPixmaps );
4462  }
4463 
4464  // stop if we've already reached both ends of the document
4465  if ( headRequest < 0 && tailRequest >= (int)d->items.count() )
4466  break;
4467  }
4468  }
4469 
4470  // send requests to the document
4471  if ( !requestedPixmaps.isEmpty() )
4472  {
4473  d->document->requestPixmaps( requestedPixmaps );
4474  }
4475  // if this functions was invoked by viewport events, send update to document
4476  if ( isEvent && nearPageNumber != -1 )
4477  {
4478  // determine the document viewport
4479  Okular::DocumentViewport newViewport( nearPageNumber );
4480  newViewport.rePos.enabled = true;
4481  newViewport.rePos.normalizedX = focusedX;
4482  newViewport.rePos.normalizedY = focusedY;
4483  // set the viewport to other observers
4484  d->document->setViewport( newViewport , this );
4485  }
4486  d->document->setVisiblePageRects( visibleRects, this );
4487 }
4488 
4489 void PageView::slotMoveViewport()
4490 {
4491  // converge to viewportMoveDest in 1 second
4492  int diffTime = d->viewportMoveTime.elapsed();
4493  if ( diffTime >= 667 || !d->viewportMoveActive )
4494  {
4495  center( d->viewportMoveDest.x(), d->viewportMoveDest.y() );
4496  d->viewportMoveTimer->stop();
4497  d->viewportMoveActive = false;
4498  slotRequestVisiblePixmaps();
4499  verticalScrollBar()->setEnabled( true );
4500  horizontalScrollBar()->setEnabled( true );
4501  return;
4502  }
4503 
4504  // move the viewport smoothly (kmplot: p(x)=1+0.47*(x-1)^3-0.25*(x-1)^4)
4505  float convergeSpeed = (float)diffTime / 667.0,
4506  x = ((float)viewport()->width() / 2.0) + horizontalScrollBar()->value(),
4507  y = ((float)viewport()->height() / 2.0) + verticalScrollBar()->value(),
4508  diffX = (float)d->viewportMoveDest.x() - x,
4509  diffY = (float)d->viewportMoveDest.y() - y;
4510  convergeSpeed *= convergeSpeed * (1.4 - convergeSpeed);
4511  center( (int)(x + diffX * convergeSpeed),
4512  (int)(y + diffY * convergeSpeed ) );
4513 }
4514 
4515 void PageView::slotAutoScoll()
4516 {
4517  // the first time create the timer
4518  if ( !d->autoScrollTimer )
4519  {
4520  d->autoScrollTimer = new QTimer( this );
4521  d->autoScrollTimer->setSingleShot( true );
4522  connect( d->autoScrollTimer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(slotAutoScoll()) );
4523  }
4524 
4525  // if scrollIncrement is zero, stop the timer
4526  if ( !d->scrollIncrement )
4527  {
4528  d->autoScrollTimer->stop();
4529  return;
4530  }
4531 
4532  // compute delay between timer ticks and scroll amount per tick
4533  int index = abs( d->scrollIncrement ) - 1; // 0..9
4534  const int scrollDelay[10] = { 200, 100, 50, 30, 20, 30, 25, 20, 30, 20 };
4535  const int scrollOffset[10] = { 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 4, 4 };
4536  d->autoScrollTimer->start( scrollDelay[ index ] );
4537  int delta = d->scrollIncrement > 0 ? scrollOffset[ index ] : -scrollOffset[ index ];
4538  verticalScrollBar()->setValue(verticalScrollBar()->value() + delta);
4539 }

4545  updateSelection( p );

4615 void PageView::slotViewMode( QAction *action )
4616 {
4617  const int nr = action->data().toInt();
4618  if ( (int)Okular::Settings::viewMode() != nr )

4727 void PageView::slotToggleAnnotator( bool on )
4728 {
4729  // the 'inHere' trick is needed as the slotSetMouseZoom() calls this
4730  static bool inHere = false;
4731  if ( inHere )
4732  return;
4733  inHere = true;
4734 
4735  // the annotator can be used in normal mouse mode only, so if asked for it,
4736  // switch to normal mode
4737  if ( on && Okular::Settings::mouseMode() != Okular::Settings::EnumMouseMode::Browse )
4738  d->aMouseNormal->trigger();
4739 
4740  // ask for Author's name if not already set
4741  if ( Okular::Settings::identityAuthor().isEmpty() )
4742  {
4743  // get default username from the kdelibs/kdecore/KUser
4744  KUser currentUser;
4745  QString userName = currentUser.property( KUser::FullName ).toString();
4746  // ask the user for confirmation/change
4747  if ( userName.isEmpty() )
4748  {
4749  bool ok = false;
4750  userName = KInputDialog::getText(
4751  i18n( "Annotations author" ),
4752  i18n( "Please insert your name or initials:" ),
4753  QString(),
4754  &ok );
4755  if ( !ok )
4756  {
4757  d->aToggleAnnotator->trigger();
4758  inHere = false;
4759  return;
4760  }
4761  }
4762  // save the name
4763  Okular::Settings::setIdentityAuthor( userName );
4764  Okular::Settings::self()->writeConfig();
4765  }
4766 
4767  // create the annotator object if not present
4768  if ( !d->annotator )
4769  {
4770  d->annotator = new PageViewAnnotator( this, d->document );
4771  bool allowTools = d->document->pages() > 0 && d->document->isAllowed( Okular::AllowNotes );
4772  d->annotator->setToolsEnabled( allowTools );
4773  d->annotator->setTextToolsEnabled( allowTools && d->document->supportsSearching() );
4774  }
4775 
4776  // initialize/reset annotator (and show/hide toolbar)
4777  d->annotator->setEnabled( on );
4778  d->annotator->setHidingForced( false );
4779 
4780  inHere = false;
4781 }

4800 
4801 void PageView::slotScrollUp( bool singleStep )
4802 {
4803  // if in single page mode and at the top of the screen, go to \ page
4804  if ( Okular::Settings::viewContinuous() || verticalScrollBar()->value() > verticalScrollBar()->minimum() )
4805  {
4806  if ( singleStep )
4807  verticalScrollBar()->triggerAction( QScrollBar::SliderSingleStepSub );
4808  else
4809  verticalScrollBar()->triggerAction( QScrollBar::SliderPageStepSub );
4810  }
4811  else if ( d->document->currentPage() > 0 )
4812  {
4813  // more optimized than document->setPrevPage and then move view to bottom
4814  Okular::DocumentViewport newViewport = d->document->viewport();
4815  newViewport.pageNumber -= viewColumns();
4816  if ( newViewport.pageNumber < 0 )
4817  newViewport.pageNumber = 0;
4818  newViewport.rePos.enabled = true;
4819  newViewport.rePos.normalizedY = 1.0;
4820  d->document->setViewport( newViewport );
4821  }
4822 }
4823 
4824 void PageView::slotScrollDown( bool singleStep )
4825 {
4826  // if in single page mode and at the bottom of the screen, go to next page
4827  if ( Okular::Settings::viewContinuous() || verticalScrollBar()->value() < verticalScrollBar()->maximum() )
4828  {
4829  if ( singleStep )
4830  verticalScrollBar()->triggerAction( QScrollBar::SliderSingleStepAdd );
4831  else
4832  verticalScrollBar()->triggerAction( QScrollBar::SliderPageStepAdd );
4833  }
4834  else if ( (int)d->document->currentPage() < d->items.count() - 1 )
4835  {
4836  // more optimized than document->setNextPage and then move view to top
4837  Okular::DocumentViewport newViewport = d->document->viewport();
4838  newViewport.pageNumber += viewColumns();
4839  if ( newViewport.pageNumber >= (int)d->items.count() )
4840  newViewport.pageNumber = d->items.count() - 1;
4841  newViewport.rePos.enabled = true;
4842  newViewport.rePos.normalizedY = 0.0;
4843  d->document->setViewport( newViewport );
4844  }
4845 }

4907 void PageView::slotFormChanged( int pageNumber )
4908 {
4909  if ( !d->refreshTimer )
4910  {
4911  d->refreshTimer = new QTimer( this );
4912  d->refreshTimer->setSingleShot( true );
4913  connect( d->refreshTimer, SIGNAL( timeout() ),
4914  this, SLOT( slotRefreshPage() ) );
4915  }
4916  d->refreshPage = pageNumber;
4917  int delay = 0;
4918  if ( d->m_formsVisible )
4919  {
4920  delay = 1000;
4921  }
4922  d->refreshTimer->start( delay );
4923 }
4924 
4925 void PageView::slotRefreshPage()
4926 {
4927  const int req = d->refreshPage;
4928  if ( req < 0 )
4929  return;
4930  d->refreshPage = -1;
4931  QMetaObject::invokeMethod( d->document, "refreshPixmaps", Qt::QueuedConnection,
4932  Q_ARG( int, req ) );
4933 }

4935 void PageView::slotSpeakDocument()
4936 {
4937  QString text;
4938  QVector< PageViewItem * >::const_iterator it = d->items.constBegin(), itEnd = d->items.constEnd();
4939  for ( ; it < itEnd; ++it )
4940  {
4941  Okular::RegularAreaRect * area = textSelectionForItem( *it );
4942  text.append( (*it)->page()->text( area ) );
4943  text.append( '\n' );
4944  delete area;
4945  }
4946 
4947  d->tts()->say( text );
4948 }

4980 void PageView::slotProcessMovieAction( const Okular::MovieAction *action )
4981 {
4982  const Okular::MovieAnnotation *movieAnnotation = action->annotation();
4983  if ( !movieAnnotation )
4984  return;
4985 
4986  Okular::Movie *movie = movieAnnotation->movie();
4987  if ( !movie )
4988  return;
4989 
4990  const int currentPage = d->document->viewport().pageNumber;
4991 
4992  PageViewItem *item = d->items.at( currentPage );
4993  if ( !item )
4994  return;
4995 
4996  VideoWidget *vw = item->videoWidgets().value( movie );
4997  if ( !vw )
4998  return;
4999 
5000  vw->show();
5001 
5002  switch ( action->operation() )
5003  {
5004  case Okular::MovieAction::Play:
5005  vw->stop();
5006  vw->play();
5007  break;
5008  case Okular::MovieAction::Stop:
5009  vw->stop();
5010  break;
5011  case Okular::MovieAction::Pause:
5012  vw->pause();
5013  break;
5014  case Okular::MovieAction::Resume:
5015  vw->play();
5016  break;
5017  };
5018 }

5020 void PageView::slotProcessRenditionAction( const Okular::RenditionAction *action )
5021 {
5022  Okular::Movie *movie = action->movie();
5023  if ( !movie )
5024  return;
5025 
5026  const int currentPage = d->document->viewport().pageNumber;
5027 
5028  PageViewItem *item = d->items.at( currentPage );
5029  if ( !item )
5030  return;
5031 
5032  VideoWidget *vw = item->videoWidgets().value( movie );
5033  if ( !vw )
5034  return;
5035 
5036  if ( action->operation() == Okular::RenditionAction::None )
5037  return;
5038 
5039  vw->show();
5040 
5041  switch ( action->operation() )
5042  {
5043  case Okular::RenditionAction::Play:
5044  vw->stop();
5045  vw->play();
5046  break;
5047  case Okular::RenditionAction::Stop:
5048  vw->stop();
5049  break;
5050  case Okular::RenditionAction::Pause:
5051  vw->pause();
5052  break;
5053  case Okular::RenditionAction::Resume:
5054  vw->play();
5055  break;
5056  };
5057 }
